anya-e0702n:11_0: So maṃ ciraṃ pātu sukhaṃ sadā sadā.
anya-e0702n:40_2: Amhākañhi bhagavā sammāsambuddho veneyyānaṃ hitatthāya hatthagataṃ sukhaṃ anādiyitvā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato
anya-e0702n:40_3: pādamūle byākaraṇaṃ nāma mañjūsaka pupphaṃ pilandhitvā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asakhye yāni anekāsu
anya-e0702n:40_4: jātīsu attano khedaṃ anapekkhitvā samatiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā tusitapure devasukhaṃ anubhavi.
anya-e0702n:41_0: Tadā devehi uyyojiyamāno hutvā kapilavatthumhi hosamataraññā pabhuti asambhinnāttiyavaṃsikassa suddho
anya-e0702n:41_1: dhanassanāma mahārañño aggamahesiyā asambhinnāttiyavaṃ sikāya māyāya kucchīsmiṃ āsāḷimāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n:41_2: guruvāre paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā asamāsaccayena vesākhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ sukkavāre vijāyitvā soḷasavassikakāle
anya-e0702n:41_3: rajjasampattiṃ patvā ekūnatiṃsavassāni atikkamitvā maṅgalauyyānaṃ nikkhamanakāle devehi dassitāni cattāri
anya-e0702n:41_4: nimittāni passitvā saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anomāyanāma nadiyā tīre bhamara
anya-e0702n:41_5: vaṇṇasannibhāni kesāni chinditvā devadattiyakāsāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ne rañjarāyanāma nadiyā tīre vesākhamāsassa
anya-e0702n:41_6: puṇṇamiyaṃ paccūsakāle sujātāyanāma seṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ ekūnapaṇṇāsavārena paribhuñjitvā purimikānaṃ
anya-e0702n:41_7: sammāsambuddhānaṃ dhammatāya suvaṇṇapātiṃ nadiyaṃ otāretvā mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aparājitapallaṅke
anya-e0702n:41_8: nisīditvā anamataggasaṃ sārato paṭṭhāya attānaṃ chāyā viya anuyantānaṃ anekasatakilesaverīnaṃ sīsaṃ catūhi
anya-e0702n:41_9: maggasatthehi chinditvā tilokaggamahādhammarājattaṃ patvā pañcatālīsavassānaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu tesaṃ
anya-e0702n:41_10: tesaṃ sattānaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattijālaṃ patthāretvā desanāñāṇaṃ vijambhetvā dhammaṃ desetvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:41_11: Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca pana asītivassāyukakāle vijjotayitvā nibbāyanappa dāpajālaṃ viya anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
anya-e0702n:41_12: Maccu dhammassa ca nāma tīsu lokesu atimamāyitabbo esa,
anya-e0702n:54_0: Sattāhaparinibbute ca bhagavati āyasmā mahākassapo tiyaḍḍhasatādhikehi sahassamattehi bhikkhūhi saddhi
anya-e0702n:54_1: pāvāto kusīnārāyaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge bhagavā sammāsambuddho parinibbutoti sutvā avītasoka bhikkhū
anya-e0702n:54_2: rodante disvā vuddhapabbajito subhaddānāma bhikkhu evaṃ vadati–
anya-e0702n:54_5: pubbe mayaṃ bhavāma samaṇena ge,bhamena upaddutā–
anya-e0702n:54_7: mā idaṃ karittha na idaṃ tumhākaṃ kappatīti,
anya-e0702n:54_9: idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ yaṃ icchāma,
anya-e0702n:54_11: yaṃ yaṃ pana na icchāma,taṃ taṃ sakkā akātunti.
anya-e0702n:54_12: Taṃ sutvā īdisaṃ pana verīpuggalaṃ paṭicca sammāsambuddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ khippaṃ antaradhāreyya,
anya-e0702n:54_13: idāni suvaṇṇakkhandhasadiso sarīro saṃvijjamāno yeva dukkhena nipphādite sāsane mahābhayaṃ uppajji ca,
anya-e0702n:54_14: īdiso puggalo aññaṃ īdisaṃ puggalaṃ sahāyaṃ labhitvā vuddhimāpajjanto hāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyya maññeti cittakkhedaṃ
anya-e0702n:54_15: patvā dhammasaṃvegaṃ labhitvā imaṃ bhikkhuṃ idheva setavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā sarīre bhasmena vikiritvā
anya-e0702n:55_1: idāni samaṇassa gotamassa sarīraṃ saṃvijjamānaṃyeva parisā vivādaṃ karontīti manussā upavadissantiti.
anya-e0702n:55_2: Tato pacchā imaṃ vitakkaṃ vūpasametvā khamitvā sammāsambuddho bhagavā parinibbāyamānopi tena pana desito dhammo saṃvijjati,
anya-e0702n:55_3: tena desitassa dhammassa thiraṃ patiṭṭhāpanatthāya saṅgāyiyamānaṃ īdisehi puggalehi sāsanaṃ na antaradhāyissati,
anya-e0702n:55_4: ciraṃ ṭhassati yevāti manasikaritvā bhagavato dinnapaṃsu kūlacīvarādivasena dhammānuggahaṃ anussaritvā
anya-e0702n:55_5: bhagavato parinibbānato tatiye māse āsāḷimāsassa puṇṇamito pañcame divase rājagahe sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ
anya-e0702n:55_6: ājātasattuṃnāma rājānaṃ nissāya pañcahi arahanta satehi saddhiṃ sattamāsehi paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyanaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:56_0: Tadā aṭṭhacattālīsādhikasatakaliyugaṃ anavasesato apanetvā kaliyugena sāsanaṃ samaṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n:56_1: Yadā pana ajātasattu rañño rajjaṃ patvā aṭṭhavassāni ahesuṃ,
anya-e0702n:56_2: tadā marammaraṭṭhe taṅkosaṅgatvapure jambudīpadhajassanāma rañño rajjaṃ patvā atirekapañcavassāni ahesunti.
anya-e0702n:57_0: Imissañca paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmā upāli āyasmā ānando āyasmā anuruddho cāti evamādayo
anya-e0702n:57_1: pañcasatappamāṇā mahātherā paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyitvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:57_2: Evaṃ subhaddassa duṭṭhapabbajitassa duṭṭhavacanaṃ sāsanassa anuggahe kāraṇaṃnāma ahosi.
anya-e0702n:57_3: Subhaddo ca nāma duṭṭhapabbajito ātumānagaravāsī ahosi kappakakuliko.
anya-e0702n:57_5: tadā atteno putte dve sāmaṇere kappakakammaṃ kārāpetvā laddhehi taṇḍulatelādīhi vatthūhi yāguṃ pacitvā sasaṅghassa buddhassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n:57_6: Bhagavā pana tāni appaṭiggahetvā kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vigarahitvā akappiyasamādānadukkaṭāpattiṃ kappakapubbassa
anya-e0702n:57_8: Taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca veraṃ bandhitvā sāsanaṃ viddhaṃsitukāmatāya tattakaayoguḷaṃ gilitvā uggīranto viya īdisaduṭṭhavacanaṃ vadīti.
anya-e0702n:58_4: mahākassapādīnañca arahantānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ sisāparamparā anekā honti,
anya-e0702n:72_0: Tato paraṃ vassasataṃ tesaṃ sissaparamparā sāsanaṃ dhāretvā āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:72_1: Athānukkamena gacchantesu rattidivesu vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ kappati siṅgiloṇakappā,
anya-e0702n:73_0: Tesaṃ susunāgaputto kāḷāsokonāma rājā pakkho ahosi.
anya-e0702n:73_1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vajjīsu cārikaṃ caramāno vesālikā kira vajjiputtakā
anya-e0702n:73_2: bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ dasavatthūni dipentīti sutvā na kho panetaṃ ppatirūpaṃ,
anya-e0702n:73_3: yvāhaṃ dasabalassa sāsanavipattiṃ sutvā appossukko bhaveyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:73_4: sandhāhaṃ adhammavādino niggahetvā dhammaṃ dīpessāmīti cintayanto yena vesālī,
anya-e0702n:73_6: Tadā āyasmā mahāyaso revatasabbakāmiādīhi sattasatehi arahantehi saddhiṃ saṅgāyissāmīti vesāliyaṃ vālukārāmaṃ āgacchi.
anya-e0702n:73_7: Vajjiputtakāca bhikkhū upārambhacittā kāḷāsokaṃnāma rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mayaṃ kho mahārāja imasmiṃ mahāvanārāme gandhakuṭiṃ rakkhitvā vassāma,
anya-e0702n:73_8: idāni mahārāja adhammavādino aññe bhikkhū vilumpitukāmā viddhaṃsitukāmā āgatāti ārocesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:73_9: Kāḷāsoko ca mahārājā āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ appavisanatthāya nivārethāti amacce pesesi.
anya-e0702n:73_10: Amaccāca nivāretuṃ gacchantā devatānaṃ ānubhāvena bhikkhū na passanti.
anya-e0702n:73_11: Tadaheva ca rattibhāge kāḷāsokamahārājā lohakumbhīniraye patanākārena supinaṃ passi.
anya-e0702n:73_12: Tassa rañño bhagini nandānāma therī ākāsena āgacchanti dhammavādino mahāthere niggaṇhitvā adhammavādīnaṃ
anya-e0702n:73_13: bhikkhūnaṃ paggahaṇe dosabahulataṃ pakāsetvā sāsanassa paggahaṇatthāya ovādaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:74_0: Kāḷāsokarājā ca saṃvegappatto hutvā āyasmantānaṃ mahāyasattherādīnaṃ khamāpetvā ajātasatturājā viya saṅgāyane paggahaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:75_0: Mahāyasattherādayo ca kāḷāsokaṃ rājānaṃ nissāya vālukārāme vajjiputtakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pakāsitāni adhammavatthūni
anya-e0702n:76_0: Tadā ca majjhimadese pātaliputtanagare susunāgarañño puttabhūtassa kāḷāsokarañño atisekaṃ patvā dasavassāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:76_1: Parammaraṭṭhe pana sirikhettanagare dvattagoṅkassanāma rañño abhisittakālato pure ekavassaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n:77_0: Imissañca dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ mahāyasa revata sabbakāmippamukhā sattasatappamāṇā mahātherā dutiyaṃ saṅkhāyitvā dutiyaṃ sāsanaṃ paggahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:78_0: Āyasmā mahāyasattherocanāma pañcahi etadaggaḷāne hi bhagavatā thomitassa ānandattherassa saddhivihāriko ahosi.
anya-e0702n:78_2: Kāḷāsokarājāca pageva adhammavādībhikkhūnaṃ sahāyopi samāno puna dhammavādibhikkhūnaṃ sahāyo hutvā anuggahaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:79_0: Dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pana mahāyasatthera revata sabbakāmippamukhānaṃ sattasatānaṃ mahātherānaṃ sissaparamparā anekā honti,
anya-e0702n:79_4: Te pana mahātherā dutiyaṃ saṅgāyitvā parinibbāyiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n:89_0: Tato paraṃ aṭṭhatiṃsādhikāni dvevassasatāni sammāsabbuddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ nirākulaṃ ahosi nirabbudaṃ.
anya-e0702n:89_1: Aṭṭhatiṃsādhike pana dvivassasate sampatte pāṭaliputta nagare siridhammāsokassanāma rañño kāle nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ
anya-e0702n:89_2: paṭicca buddhasāsane pasīditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ bāhullaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n:89_3: Tadā saṭṭhisahassamattā titthiyā lābhasakkāraṃ apekkhitvā apabbajitāpi pabbajitāviya hutvā upāsathapavāraṇādikammesu pavisanti,
anya-e0702n:90_0: Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho idāni aparisuddhā parisāti manasi karitvā uposathaṃ na akāsi.
anya-e0702n:90_1: Sāsane abbudaṃ hutvā sattavassāni uposathapavāraṇāni chijjanti.
anya-e0702n:90_2: Siridhammāso ko ca rājā taṃ sutvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehi uposathaṃ kārāpehīti ekaṃ amaccaṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n:90_3: Amacco ca bhikkhū uposathaṃ akattukāme kiṃ karissāmīti rājānaṃ paṭipucchituṃ avisahatāya sayaṃ mūḷo hutvā
anya-e0702n:90_4: aññena mūḷena manthetvā sace bhikkhusaṅgho uposathaṃ na kareyya,
anya-e0702n:90_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ghātetukāmo mahārājāti sayaṃ mūḷo hutvā mūḷassa santikā mūḷavacanaṃ sutvā vihāraṃ gantvā uposathaṃ akattukāmaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ghātesi.
anya-e0702n:91_0: Rājā ca taṃ sutvā ayaṃ bālo mayā anāṇattova hutvā īdisaṃ luddakammaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0702n:91_1: ahaṃ pāpakammato muccissāmivā māvāti dvaḷakajāto hutvā mahāmoggaliputta tissattheraṃ gaṅgāya patisotato ānetvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ theraṃ pucchi.
anya-e0702n:91_2: Thero ca dīpakatittirajātakena acetanatāya pāpakammato mocessasiti vissajjesi,
anya-e0702n:91_4: vādena vādaṃ tulayitvā saṭṭhisahassamatte titthiye sāsanabāhiraṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:91_7: Asokārāme ca sahassamattā mahātherā navahi māsehi saṅgāyiṃsuṃ.
anya-e0702n:92_0: Tadā majjhimadese pāṭaliputtanagare siridhammāsokarañño rajjaṃ patvā aṭṭhārasavassāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:92_1: Marammaraṭṭhe pana sirikhettanagare ramboṅkassanāma rañño rajjaṃ patvā dvādasa vassāni ahesunti.
anya-e0702n:93_0: Imissañca tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ mahāmoggaliputtatissattheronāma dutiyasaṅgāyakehi mahātherehi brahmalo kaṃ
anya-e0702n:93_1: gantvā sāsanassa paggahaṇatthaṃ tissanāma mahābrahmānaṃ āyācita niyāmena tato cavitvā idha moggaliyānāma
anya-e0702n:94_0: Lābhasakkāraṃ apekkhitvā saṭṭhisahassamatānaṃ titthiyānaṃ samaṇālayaṃ katvā uposathapavāraṇādīsu kammesu
anya-e0702n:94_1: pavesanaṃ parisāya asuddhattā sattavassāni uposathassa akaraṇañca sāsanassa paggahaṇe kāraṇameva.
anya-e0702n:94_2: Mahāmoggaliputtatissa majjhantika mahārevappamukhā mahātherā tatiyaṃ saṅgāyitvā tatiyaṃ sāsanaṃ paggahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:95_0: Siridhammāsokarājā ca titthiyānaṃ vādaṃ sallakkhetvā titthiye bahisāsanakaraṇādīhi sāsanassa paggaho rājāti veditabbo.
anya-e0702n:95_1: Mahāmoggaliputtatissa majjhintika mahārevappamukhānaṃ sahassamattānaṃ mahātherānaṃ sissaparamparā anekā honti,
anya-e0702n:95_5: Te pana mahātherā tatiyaṃ saṅgāyitvā parinibbāyiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n:109_0: Tato paraṃ kattha sammāsambuddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahissatīti vimaṃsitvā mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero
anya-e0702n:109_1: paccantadese jinasāsanassa suppatiṭṭhiyamānabhāvaṃ passitvā navaṭṭhānāni jinasāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya
anya-e0702n:109_5: tvaṃ etaṃ dīpaṃ gantvā tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhapehīti,
anya-e0702n:109_14: Tattha ca upasampadapahonakena saṅghena saddhiṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n:109_15: Te ca mahātherā visuṃ visuṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ tattha tattha patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:109_16: Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca tesu tesu ṭhānesu bhikkhūnaṃ kāsāvapajjotena vijjotamānā abbhahimadhūrajorāhusaṅkhātehi
anya-e0702n:109_17: vimatto viya nisānātho jinasāsanaṃ anantarāyaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:110_0: Tesu pana navasu ṭhānesu suvaṇṇabhūmināma adhunā sudhammanagarameva.
anya-e0702n:110_4: Ito kira suvaṇṇabhūmi sattamattāni yojanasatāni honti,
anya-e0702n:110_5: ekena vāte na gacchantī nāvā sattahi ahorattehi gacchati,
anya-e0702n:110_6: athekasmiṃ samaye evaṃ gacchanti nāvā sattāhampi nadiyā vaṭṭamaccha piṭṭhe neva gatāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0702n:110_7: vuttena sīhaḷadīpato suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gatamaggappamāṇena sukhammapurato sīhaḷadīpaṃ gatamaggappamāṇaṃ sameti.
anya-e0702n:110_8: Sudhamme purato kira hi hiṃsaḷadīpaṃ sattamattāni yojanasatāni honti,
anya-e0702n:110_9: ujuṃ vāyuāgamanakāle gacchanti vāyunāvā sattahi ahorattehi sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0702n:111_3: Teneva mahājanakakumārādayo campānagarādito saṃvohāratthāya nāvāya suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ āgamaṃsūti.
anya-e0702n:113_0: Aparantaṃ nāma visuṃ ekaraṭṭhamevāti apare vadanti.
anya-e0702n:113_3: Kasmā aparantaṃ nāma sunāparantaraṭṭhamevāti viññāyatīti ce.
anya-e0702n:113_6: salākādānādhikāre laddhetadaggaṭṭhānataṃ dassantehi aparantaraṭṭhaṃ suna saddena yojetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n:113_7: Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca tameva raṭṭhaṃ vinā sunasaddena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n:113_9: Mandhāturañño jeṭṭhaputto catuddīpavāsi no pakkositvā tesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ niyyādesi.
anya-e0702n:113_14: Tatra jātāpi hi tesaṃ puttātivā sunātivā vuttā,
anya-e0702n:113_16: Vatticchāvasena vā vācāsiliṭṭhavasena ca idameva sunasaddena visesetvā voharantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:115_6: Imassa amhākaṃ rañño bhātikarañño kāle sirikhettanagare gumbhehi paṭicchādite ekasmiṃ pathavipuñje anto
anya-e0702n:115_7: nimmujjitvā ṭhitaṃ porāṇikaṃ ekaṃ lohamayabuddhapaṭipibbaṃ paṭilabhi,
anya-e0702n:115_8: tassa ca pallaṅke idaṃ vanavāsīraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ pūjanatthāyātiādinā porāṇalekhanaṃ dissati,
anya-e0702n:116_1: Tāni pana raṭṭhāni ekābaddhāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0702n:116_2: Teneva majjhanti kattheraṃ ekaṃ dvīsu raṭṭhesu pesesi.
anya-e0702n:116_4: Tadā pana ekassa rañño āṇāya patiṭṭhānavisayattā ekattavacanena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttantipi vadanti.
anya-e0702n:118_1: Ādhunā hi mahāraṭṭhameva na garasaddena yojetvā mahānagararaṭṭhanti voharantīti.
anya-e0702n:119_0: Cinaraṭṭhaṃnāma himavantena ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ cīnaraṭṭhaṃ ye vāti.
anya-e0702n:120_0: Idaṃ sāsanassa navasu ṭhānesu visuṃ visuṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n:121_1: Sammāsambuddhassa hi bhagavato saddhivihāriko upālitthe ro,tassa sisso dāsakatthero,
anya-e0702n:121_3: tassa sisso siggavatthero candavajjitthe ro ca,
anya-e0702n:121_4: tesaṃ sisso moggaliputtatissattheroti ime pañcamahātherā sāsanavaṃse ādibhūtā ācariyaparamparānāma.
anya-e0702n:121_5: Tesañhi sissaparamparabhūtā theraparamparā yāvajjatanā na upacchindhanti.
anya-e0702n:121_6: Ācariyaparamparāya ca lajjibhikkhū yeva pavesetvā kathetabbā no alajjibhikkhū.
anya-e0702n:121_7: Alajjībhikkhū nāma hi bahussutāpi samānā lābhagarulokagaruādihi dhammatanti nāsetvā sāsanavare mahābhayaṃ uppādentīti.
anya-e0702n:121_8: Sāsanarakkhanakammaṃnāma hi lajjīnaṃyeva visayo no alajjīnaṃ.
anya-e0702n:121_10: anāgate sāsanaṃ ko nāma rakkhissatīti anupekkhitvā anāgate sāsanaṃ lajjino rakkhissanti,
anya-e0702n:121_13: Evaṃ majjhimadesepi alajjīpuggalā bahu santīti veditabbā.
anya-e0702n:122_0: Parinibbānato hi bhagavato vassasatānaṃ upari pubbe vuttanayeneva vajjiputtakā bhikkhū adhammavatthūni
anya-e0702n:122_1: dīpetvā paṭhamasaṅgītikāle bahikatehi pāpabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ mantetvā sahāyaṃ gavesetvā mahāsaṅgītivohārena
anya-e0702n:122_5: seyyathāpi nāma jarasiṅgālo catupadasāmaññena mānaṃ jappetvā attānaṃ sīhaṃ viya maññitvā sīho viya sīhanādaṃ nadīti.
anya-e0702n:122_6: Te pāvacanaṃ yathā bhūtaṃ ajānitvā saddacchāyāmattena yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ nāma siṃsu.
anya-e0702n:123_0: Tato pacchā kālaṃ atikkante tatoyeva aññamaññaṃ vādato bhijjitvā gokulikonāma eko gaṇo ekabyohāronāma ekoti dve gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:123_1: Tato pacchā gokulikagaṇagaṇatoyeva aññamaññaṃ bhijjitvā bahussutikonāma eko gaṇo paññattivādonāma ekoti dve gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:123_2: Punapi tehiyeva gaṇehi cetiyavādonāma eko gaṇo bhijji.
anya-e0702n:124_0: Tato pacchā cirakālaṃ atikkante dhammavādīgaṇehi visabhāgagaṇaṃ pavisitvā mahiṃsāsakonāma ekogaṇo vajjiputtakonāma ekoti dve gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:124_1: Tato pacchāpi vajjiputtakagaṇatoyeva aññamaññaṃ bhijjitvā dhammuttarikonāma eko gaṇo,
anya-e0702n:125_0: Punapi mahiṃsāsakagaṇato aññamaññaṃ bhijjitvā sabbatthivādonāma eko gaṇo,
anya-e0702n:125_4: suttavādo nāma ekoti pañca gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:126_0: Evaṃ majjhimadese dutiyasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyantānaṃ mahātherānaṃ dhammavādītheravādagaṇato visuṃ visuṃ bhijjamānā adhammavādīgaṇā sattarasa ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:126_1: Te ca adhammavādīgaṇā sāsane theraparamparāya ananto gadhā.
anya-e0702n:126_2: Te hi sāsane upakārā na honti,
anya-e0702n:126_3: theraparamparāya ca pavesetvā gaṇhituṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0702n:127_0: Mahākassapattherādito pana āgatā theraparamparā upāli dāsako cevātiādinā parivārakhandhake samantapāsādikaṭṭhakathāyañca āgatanayeneva veditabbā.
anya-e0702n:128_1: tāva tesaṃ therānaṃ parisuddhā cārādīnīti sakkā ñātuṃ,
anya-e0702n:128_2: seyyathāpi nadiyā uparisote meghavassāni anumānetvā adhosote nadiyā udakassa bāhullabhāvo viññātuṃ sakkāti ayaṃ kāraṇānumānanayo nāma.
anya-e0702n:129_1: tāva therānaṃ parisuddhācārādīni anumānetvā upālittherassa parisuddhācārādīnīti sakkā ñātuṃ,
anya-e0702n:129_2: seyyathāpi nāma uparidhūmaṃ passitvā anumānetvā aggi atthīti sakkā ñātunti ayaṃ phalānumānana yo nāma.
anya-e0702n:130_0: Adibhūtassa pana upālittherassa avasānabhūtassa ca moggaliputtatissattherassa parisuddhācārādīni anumānetvā
anya-e0702n:130_1: majjhe dāsakasoṇasiggavādīnaṃ therānaṃ parisuddhācārādīniti sakkā ñātuṃ,
anya-e0702n:130_2: seyyathāpi nāma silāpaṭṭassa orabhāge pārabhāge ca migapadavaḷañjanaṃ disvā anumānetvā majjhe apākaṭaṃ
anya-e0702n:130_3: padavaḷañcanaṃ atthīti sakkā ñātunti ayaṃ migapadavaḷañjana nayo nāma.
anya-e0702n:131_0: Evaṃ tīhi nayehi ayaṃ theravādagaṇo dhammavādīlajjipesaloti veditabbo.
anya-e0702n:131_2: Theraparamparā ca yāva potthakāruḷā parivārakhandhake samanta pāsādikāyañca tato mahindo iṭṭiyotiādinā vutta nayena veditabbāti.
anya-e0702n:135_0: 2. Idāni sīhaḷadīpasāsanakathāmaggaṃ vattuṃ okāso anuppatto, tasmā taṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n:136_1: Sammāsambuddho kira sīhaḷadīpaṃ dharamānakālepi tikkhattuṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:136_2: Paṭhamaṃ yakkhānaṃ damanatthaṃ ekakova gantvā yakkhe dametvā mayi parinibbute sīhaḷadīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissatīti
anya-e0702n:136_3: tambapaṇṇidīpe ārakkhaṃ karonto tikkhattuṃ dīpaṃ āviñchi.
anya-e0702n:136_4: Dutiyaṃ mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ nāgarā jūnaṃ damanatthāya ekakova gantvā te dametvā agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:136_5: Tatiyaṃ pañcabhikkhusataparivāro gantvā mahācetiyaṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhipatiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne
anya-e0702n:136_6: ca mahiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mudiṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca dīghavāpi cetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇiyacetiyaṭṭhāne
anya-e0702n:137_0: Tadā ca pana sāsanaṃ ogāhetvāna tāva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0702n:137_1: Pacchā pana yathāvuttattheraparamparāya samabhiniviṭṭhena mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena pesito mahindatthero
anya-e0702n:137_2: jinacakke pañcatiṃsādhike dvisate sampatte dutiyakattikamāse iṭṭiyena uttiyena sambulena bhaddasālena
anya-e0702n:137_3: cāti etehi therehi saddhiṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:137_4: Soṇuttarattherādayo jinacakke pañcatiṃsādhike dvisate sampatte dutiyakattikamāseyeva sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya
anya-e0702n:137_5: attano attano sampattabhārabhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:138_0: Mahāmahindatthero pana sattamāsāni āgametvā jinacakke chattiṃsādhike dvisate sampatte jeṭṭhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n:138_2: Teneva tesu navasu ṭhānesu sīhaḷadīpaṃ chattiṃsādhike dvisa te agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:138_3: Aññāni pana aṭṭha ṭhānāni pañcatiṃsādhikadvisateyeva agamāsīti visuṃva vatthapetabbo.
anya-e0702n:139_0: Kasmā pana mahāmahindatthero sattamāsāni āgametvā sabbapacchā sīhaḷadīpaṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e0702n:139_1: Sīhaḷadīpe muṭabhivo nāma rājā jarādubbalo ahoti,
anya-e0702n:139_3: tassa pana putto devānaṃ piya tisso nāma rājakumāro daharo sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ samattho bhavissati,
anya-e0702n:139_4: so ca devānaṃ viyatisso rajjaṃ tāva labhatu vedissakagirinagare mātuyā saddhiṃ ñātake tāva passāmīti
anya-e0702n:139_5: apekkhitvā sattamāsāni āgametvā chattiṃsādhikadvisateyeva jinacakke mahāmahindatthero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0702n:140_0: Mahāmahindatthero ca iṭṭiyādīhi therehi catūhi bhāgineyyena sumanasāmaṇerena bhaṇḍukena nāma upāsake
anya-e0702n:140_1: na cāti etehi saddhiṃ chattiṃsādhike dvisate jinacakke jeṭṭhamāsapuṇṇamiyaṃ suvaṇṇahaṃsā viya jeṭṭhamāse
anya-e0702n:140_2: nabhaṃ uggantvā ākāsamaggena anurādhapurassa puratthimadisābhāge missa kapabbatakūṭe patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:141_0: Jeṭṭhamāsassa ca puṇṇamiyaṃ laṅkādīpe jeṭṭhamūlanakkhattasabhā hutvā manussā chaṇaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:141_2: jeṭṭhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ jeṭṭhanakkhattaṃ mūlanakkhattaṃ vā hotīti.
anya-e0702n:141_3: Tattha ca puṇṇaminakkhattaṃ rājamattante puṇṇaminakkhattavicāraṇanayena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:142_0: Devānaṃ piya tisso ca rājā nakkhattaṃ nāma ghosāpetvā chaṇaṃ kārethāti amacce āṇāpetvā cattālī sapurisasahassaparivāro
anya-e0702n:142_3: Atha tasmiṃ pabbate adhivatthā ekā devatā migarūpena rājānaṃ phalobhetvā pakkositvā therassa abhimukhaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:143_0: Thero rājānaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā mamaṃyeva rājā passatu mā itareti adhiṭṭhahitvā tissa tissa ito ehīti āha.
anya-e0702n:143_2: imasmiṃ dīpe jāto sakalopi manusso maṃ tissoti nāmaṃ gahetvā ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
anya-e0702n:143_3: ayaṃ pana bhinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍukāsāva vasano maṃ nāmena ālapati,
anya-e0702n:146_0: Tadā ca devānaṃ piyatisso rājā asokaraññā pesitena abhisekena ekamāsābhisitto ahosi.
anya-e0702n:146_2: So ca asokaraññā pesite dhammapaṇṇākāre ratanattayaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sāsanappavattiṃ acirasutaṃ anussaramāno taṃ therassa samaṇā mayaṃ mahārāja,
anya-e0702n:146_3: dhammarājassa sāvakāti vacanaṃ sutvā ayyā nukho āgatāti tāvadeva āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno. Yathāha,–
anya-e0702n:149_0: Sammodanīyaṃ kathañca kurumāneyeva tasmiṃ tānipi cattālīsapurisasahassāni āgantvā samparivāresuṃ.
anya-e0702n:149_2: Rājā disvā ime kadā āgatāti āha.
anya-e0702n:149_4: Idāni pana jambudīpe aññepi evarūpā samaṇā santīti.
anya-e0702n:149_5: Santi mahārāja etarahijambudīpo kālāvapajjoto isivātapaṭivāto, tasmiṃ–
anya-e0702n:152_4: Thero atthi nukho rañño passāveyyattikanti vīmaṃsanatthāya āsannaṃ ambarukkhaṃ ārabbha pañhaṃ pucchi, –
anya-e0702n:153_2: Imaṃ pana mahārāja ambaṃ muñcitvā añño ambo atthi vā natthi vāti.
anya-e0702n:153_4: Imañca ambaṃ te ca ambe muñcitvā atthi nukho mahārāja aññe rukkhāti.
anya-e0702n:153_7: Aññe ca ambe anambe ca muñcitvā atthi pana añño rukkhoti.
anya-e0702n:154_2: Te muñcitvā keci aññātakāpi atthi mahārājāti.
anya-e0702n:154_4: Tavañātake ca aññātake ca muñcitvā atthañño koci mahārājāti.
anya-e0702n:154_6: Sādhu mahārāja attā nāma attano neva ñātako na aññātakoti.
anya-e0702n:155_0: Atha thero paṇḍito rājā sakkhissati dhammaṃ aññātunti cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0702n:155_1: Kathāpariyosāne rājā tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhahi saddhiṃ cattālīsāya pāṇasahassehīti.
anya-e0702n:156_0: Iccevaṃ sīhaḷadīpe sāsanānuggahaṇa mahindattherato āgatā sissaparamparā bahū honti,
anya-e0702n:157_1: yāvajjabhanā tesaṃyeva antevāsikaparamparabhūtāya ācariyaparamparāya ābhatantiti veditabbanti.
anya-e0702n:158_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ sissaparamparabhūtā ācariyaparamparā yāvajjatanā sāsane pākaṭā hutvā āgacchantīti veditabba.
anya-e0702n:159_1: Tīṇi hi vinayadharassa lakkhaṇāni icchi tabbāni.
anya-e0702n:159_3: Suttañcassa svāgataṃ hoti suppavatti suvinicchitaṃ suttato anubyañjanatoti idamekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0702n:159_4: vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṃhīroti idaṃ dutiyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:159_5: ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā supadhāritāti idaṃ tatiyaṃ.
anya-e0702n:160_0: Tattha ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti theraparamparā vaṃsaparamparā cassa suṭṭhugahitā hoti.
anya-e0702n:161_1: pubbāparānusandhito atthato kāraṇato ca upa dhāritā.
anya-e0702n:161_2: Attano matiṃ pahāya ācariyasuddhiyā vattā hoti,
anya-e0702n:161_4: so asukassāti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ thera vādaṅgaṃ āharitvā yāva upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhīti pāpetvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0702n:161_5: Tatopi āharitvā upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhi,
anya-e0702n:161_9: moggaliputtatissatthero attano upajjhāyassa siggavattherassa caṇḍa vajjittherassa cāti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ
anya-e0702n:161_10: theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā attano ācariyaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0702n:161_11: Evaṃ uggahitā hi ācariyaparamparā suggahitā hoti.
anya-e0702n:162_0: Evaṃ asakkontena pana dve tayo parivaṭṭā uggahetabbā.
anya-e0702n:162_1: Sabbapacchimena hi nayena yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripuñchañca vadanti,
anya-e0702n:163_0: Yathā vuttattheraparamparā pana bhagavato dharamānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva potthakāruḷā mukhapāṭheneva piṭakattayaṃ dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0702n:163_1: paripuṇṇaṃ pana katvā potthake likhitvā na ṭhapenti.
anya-e0702n:163_2: Evaṃ mahātherā dukkarakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:164_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kira caṇḍālatissabhayena saṅkhubbhitvā devo ca avassitvā dubbhikkhabhayaṃ uppajji.
anya-e0702n:164_1: Tadā akko devānamindo āgantvā tumhe bhante piṭakaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkhissatha,
anya-e0702n:165_0: Tadā saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū samuddatīraṃ gantvā puna etadahosi,–
anya-e0702n:165_3: Tato pacchā nāvā titthato nivattitvā sīhaḷadīpekadesaṃ malayajanapadaṃ gantvā mūlaphalādīhiyeva yāpetvā sajjhāyaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:165_4: Chātakabhayena atipīḷitā hutvā evampi kātuṃ asakkonto vāḷukatale uraṃ ṭhapetvā sīsena sīsaṃ abhimukhaṃ katvā vācaṃ anicchāretvā manasāyeva akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:165_5: Evaṃ dvādasavassāni saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya tepiṭakaṃ rakkhitvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:166_0: Dvādasavassesu pana atikkantesu taṃ bhayaṃ vūpasamitvā pubbe jambudīpaṃ gacchantā sattabhikkhusatā āgantvā
anya-e0702n:166_2: Tepi saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū tameva vihāraṃ gantvā aññamaññaṃ sammantetvā sajjhāyiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:166_6: Evaṃ piṭakattayaṃ mukhapāṭheneva dhāretvā mahātherā dukkarakammaṃ karontīti veditabbā.
anya-e0702n:167_0: Yampi pariyattiṃ ekapadamattampi avirajjhitvā dhārenti, taṃ dukkarakammameva.
anya-e0702n:168_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kira punabbasukassa nāma kuṭumbikassa putto tissatthero buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā imaṃ jambudīpaṃ
anya-e0702n:168_1: āgantvā yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa santike buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā gacchanto nāvaṃ abhirūhanatitthe
anya-e0702n:168_2: ekasmiṃ pade uppannakaṅkho yojanasatamaggaṃ nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge ekassa
anya-e0702n:168_6: Thero vā siyā koṭṭetvā nisīdanaṭṭhāne paribhaṇḍaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:168_10: amhākaṃ gatamaggaṃ āvajjitvā anāgate sabrahmacārino paṭipattiṃ pūretabbaṃ maññissantīti.
anya-e0702n:168_11: Tissattheropi ācariyassa santike kaṅkhaṃ chinditvā sīhaḷadīpameva sakaṭṭhānaṃ āgamāsīti.
anya-e0702n:168_12: Iccevaṃ pariyattiṃ ekapadamattampi avirajjhitvā dhāraṇampi dukkarakammamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:169_1: tassa anantaradhānatthāya asammosatthāya uggahadhāraṇādivasena rakkhanampi karonti,
anya-e0702n:170_0: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva kira mahābhaye ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso paguṇo ahosi.
anya-e0702n:170_1: Atha catunikāyikatissattherassa upajjhāyo mahātipiṭakatthero nāma mahārakkhitattheraṃāha,–
anya-e0702n:170_2: āvuso mahārakkhita asukassa santike mahāniddesaṃ gaṇhāhīti.
anya-e0702n:170_5: Sādhu bhante tumhesu nisinnesu gaṇhissāmīti paṭṭhapatvā rattindivaṃ nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇanto osānadivase
anya-e0702n:170_6: heṭṭhāmañce itthiṃ disvā bhante sutaṃyeva me pubbe,
anya-e0702n:170_8: na īdisassa santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇeyyanti āha.
anya-e0702n:170_9: Tassa pana santike bahū mahātherā uggaṇhitvā mahāniddesaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:170_10: Evaṃ yaṃ yebhuyyena paguṇaṃ na karonti,
anya-e0702n:170_11: tassa anantaradhānatthāya asammosattāya uggahadhāraṇādivasena rakkhanampi dukkarakammaṃ yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:171_0: Iccevaṃ bhagavato dharamānakālato pabhuti cirakālaṃ yathāvuttamahātheraparamparā pariyattiṃ mukhapāṭheneva dhāresuṃ.
anya-e0702n:171_1: Ahovata porāṇikānaṃ mahātherānaṃ satipaññāsamādhivepullatāya hi te mukhapāṭheneva dhāretu sakkāti.
anya-e0702n:171_2: Mukhapāṭheneva porāṇakattherānaṃ pariyattidhāraṇaṃ pañcanavutādhikāni catusatāni ahosi.
anya-e0702n:172_0: Bhagavato parinibbānato mahāvaṃsasāratthasaṅgahesu āgatanayena jinacakke paṇṇāssādhike catusate sampatte
anya-e0702n:172_1: tambapaṇṇidīpe rājūnaṃ aṭṭhārasamako’saddhātissassa nāma rañño putto vaṭṭagāmaṇi nāma rājā rajjaṃ patvā
anya-e0702n:172_2: chavassakāle anāgate sattā hīnasatipaññāsamādhikā hutvā na sakkhissanti mukhapāṭhena dhāretunti upaparikkhitvā
anya-e0702n:172_3: pubbe vuttehi mahātherehi anupubbena āgatā pañcamattā mahātherasatā vaṭṭagāmaṇirājānaṃ nissāya tambapaṇṇidīpekadese
anya-e0702n:172_4: malayajanapade ālokaleṇe aṭṭhakathāya sahapiṭakattayaṃ potthake āropesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:173_0: Tañca yathāvuttasaṅgītiyo upanidhāya catutthasaṅgītiyeva nāmāti veditabbā.
anya-e0702n:174_0: Sīhaḷadīpe pana vaṭṭagāmaṇirājā marammaraṭṭhe sirikhettanagare eko nāma kukkuṭasīsarājā ca ekakālena rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:174_1: Amarapuramāpakassa rañño kāle sīhaḷadīpabhikkhuhi idha pesitasandesakathāyaṃ pana tettiṃsādhikacatusate sampatte potthakāruḷaṃ akaṃsūti āgataṃ.
anya-e0702n:177_0: Athāparaṃ jambudīpe sīhaḷadīpe ca bhikkhū visuṃ visuṃ gaṇavasena bhijjiṃsu,
anya-e0702n:177_2: Tattha jambudīpe gaṇānaṃ bhijjamānataṃ upariyeva vakkhāma.
anya-e0702n:178_0: Sīhaḷadīpe pana gaṇānaṃ bhijjamānatā evaṃ daṭṭhabbā. Kathaṃ.
anya-e0702n:178_1: Sīhaḷadīpe hi sāsanassa patiṭṭhamānakālato aṭṭhārasādhi kadvivassasate sampatte vaṭṭagāmaṇiraññā kārāvite
anya-e0702n:178_2: abhayagirivihāre parivārakhandhakaṃ pāṭhato ca atthato ca vipallāsaṃ katvā mahāvihāravāsigaṇato puthu
anya-e0702n:179_0: Abhayagirivāsigaṇassa bhijjamānato dvecattālīsādhikativassasate sampatte mahāsenena nāma raññā kārāpite
anya-e0702n:179_1: jetavanavihāre bhikkhū ubhatovisaṅgapāṭhe viparītavasena abhisaṅkharitvā abhayagirivāsigaṇato visuṃ eko
anya-e0702n:180_0: Jetavana vāsigaṇassa bhijjamānakālato ekapaññāsavassādhikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari kurundavāsino
anya-e0702n:180_1: ca kolambavāsino ca bhikkhū bhāgineyyaṃ dāṭhāpatiṃ nāma rājānaṃ nissāya ubhatovibhaṅgaparivārakhandhakapāṭhe
anya-e0702n:180_2: viparītavasena abhisaṅkharitvā vuttehi dvīhi gaṇehi visuṃ hutvā mahāvihāra vāsigaṇhattamaṃ tulayitvā
anya-e0702n:180_3: upadhāretvā mahāvihāranāmaṃ gahetvā eko gaṇo bhijji.
anya-e0702n:180_4: Evaṃ sīhaḷadīpe mahāmahindattherādīnaṃ vaṃsabhūtena mahāvihāravāsi gaṇena saddhiṃ cattāro gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:181_0: Tattha mahāvihāravāsi gaṇoyeva eko dhammavādī ahosi,
anya-e0702n:181_2: Te ca tayo adhammavādino gaṇā bhūtatthaṃ pahāya abhūtatthena dhammaṃ agaruṃ katvā cariṃsūti vacanato
anya-e0702n:181_3: sīhaḷadīpe adhammavādino tayopi alajjino gaṇā parimaṇḍalasuppaṭicchannādisikkhāpadāni anādiyitvā vicariṃsu.
anya-e0702n:181_4: Tato paṭṭhāya sāsane ekaccānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nānappakāravasena nivāsanapārupanādīni dissantiti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:182_0: Adhammavādigaṇānaṃ bhijjamānakālato sattavīsādhikānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ vassānañca upari sirisaṅghabodhi nāma
anya-e0702n:182_1: rājā mahāvihāra gaṇassa pakkho hutvā adhammavādinā tayo gaṇe niggahitvā jinasāsanaṃ paggahesi.
anya-e0702n:182_2: So ca sirisaṅgha bodhirājā amhākaṃ marammaraṭṭhe arimandananagare anuruddhena nāma raññā samakālavasena rajjasampattiṃ anubhavi.
anya-e0702n:183_0: Tato pacchā sīhaḷadīpe vohārakatissassa nāma rañño kāle kapilena nāma amaccena saddhiṃ mantetvā mahāvihāra
anya-e0702n:183_1: vāsino bhikkhū nissāya adhammavādigaṇe niggaṇhitvā jinasāsanaṃ paggaṇhāti.
anya-e0702n:184_0: Tato pacchā ca goṭṭhābhayassa nāma rañño kāle abhayagiri vāsino bhikkhū parasamuddaṃ pabbājetvā mahāvihāra vāsino bhikkhū nissāya sāsanaṃ visodhayi.
anya-e0702n:185_0: Tato pacchāpi goṭṭhābhayarañño puttabhūtassa mahāsenassa nāma rañño kāle abhayagirivāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n:185_1: abbhantare saṅghamitto nāma eko bhikkhu rañño padhānācariyo hutvā mahāmahindattherādīnaṃ arahantānaṃ
anya-e0702n:185_2: nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ mahāvihārārāmaṃ vinassituṃ mahāsenaraññā mantetvā ārabhi.
anya-e0702n:185_3: Tadā navavassāni mahāvihāre bhikkhu sañño ahosi.
anya-e0702n:185_4: Ahovata mahātherānaṃ mahiddhikānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ alajjino bhikkhū vinassāpesuṃ,
anya-e0702n:186_0: Jetavanavāsīnañca bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare eko tisso nāma bhikkhu teneva raññā mantetvā mahāvihāre sīmaṃ samūhani.
anya-e0702n:186_1: Achekattā pana tesaṃ sīmasamūhanakammaṃ na sampajjīti.
anya-e0702n:186_3: seyyathāpi nāma sākhamigo aggaggho kāsivatthaṃ mahagghaṃ bhinnati,
anya-e0702n:186_4: evameva bhinditabbavatthunā bhedakapuggalo ativiya dūro ahosīti.
anya-e0702n:193_1: Yathā hi gijjhasakuṇassa pakkhavātena suvaṇṇahaṃsā pakatiyā ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e0702n:193_3: Byagghavane viya suvaṇṇamigo nillayitvā gocaraṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0702n:193_4: yathārucivasena dhammaṃ carituṃ okāsaṃ na labhi.
anya-e0702n:194_0: Sīhaḷadīpe sāsanassa patiṭṭhānato dvisattatādhikānaṃ catusatānaṃ vassasahassānañca upari sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0702n:194_1: parinibbānato aṭṭhasattasatādhikānaṃ vassasahassānaṃ upari mahārājā nāma bhūpālo rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:194_2: So pana rājā ñadumbaragirivāsikassapattheraggamukhā mahāvihāravāsino bhikkhū tameva rājānaṃ nissāya sāsane malaṃ visodhesuṃ,
anya-e0702n:195_0: Mahāvihāravāsigaṇato aññe adhammavādinā uppabbā jetvā visodhesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:195_1: So ca mahārājā amhākaṃ marammaraṭṭhe arimaddananagare narapaticaññisūnā nāma raññā samakāla vasena rajjaṃ kāresīti veditabbo.
anya-e0702n:196_0: Tato pacchā vi vijayabāhurājānaṃ parakkamabāhurājānañca nissāya mahāvihāra vāsino bhikkhū sāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ akaṃsu,
anya-e0702n:196_1: adhammavādino sabbepi uppabbājetvā mahāvihāravāsigaṇoyeva eko patiṭṭhahi,
anya-e0702n:197_0: Sirisaṅghabodhirājā vohārikatissarājā goṭṭhābhayarājāti ete rājāno sāsanaṃ visodhentopi sabbena sabbaṃ
anya-e0702n:197_1: adhammavādigaṇānaṃ avinassanato sāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ na tāva ahosi.
anya-e0702n:197_2: Sirisaṅghabodhirañño mahārañño vijayabāhurañño parakkamabāhuraññoti etesaṃyeva rājūnaṃ kāle sabbena sabbaṃ
anya-e0702n:197_4: Tadā pana adhammavādinā sīsampi uṭṭhahituṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0702n:198_0: Aparabhāge pana ciraṃ kālaṃ atikkante micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vijātiyānaṃ bhayena laṅkādīpe sāsanaṃ osakkitvā
anya-e0702n:198_1: gaṇapūraṇamattassapi bhikkhusaṅghassa avijjamānatāya mahāvijayabāhurañño kāle rāmaññadesato saṅghaṃ ānetvā
anya-e0702n:199_0: Tato pacchā ca vimaladhammasūriyassa nāma rañño kāle rakkhāpuraraṭṭhato saṅghaṃ ānetvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:199_1: Tato pacchā ca vimalassa nāma rañño kāle tatoyeva saṅghaṃ ānetvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:199_2: Tato pacchā ca kittissirirājasīhassa nāma rañño kāle syāmaraṭṭhato saṅghaṃ ānetvā tatheva akāsīti.
anya-e0702n:201_0: Tato pacchā jinasāsane navutādhike aṭṭhavassasate sampatte buddhadāsassa nāma rañño kāle eko dhamma kathikatthero
anya-e0702n:201_1: ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakañca avasesaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya parivattitvā abhisaṅkharitvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n:202_0: Tassa kira buddhadāsassa rañño puttā asītimattā asītimahāsāvakānaṃ nāmeneva vohāritā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:202_1: Tesu puttesu sāriputtattherassa nāmena vohārito eko upatisso nāma rājakumāro pitari devaṅgate dvecattālīsavassāni rajjaṃ karesi.
anya-e0702n:203_0: Tato pacchā kaniṭṭho mahānāmo nāma rājakumāro dvāvīsavassāni rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:203_1: Tassa rañño kāle jina cakke tettiṃsādhikanavasatavasse sīhaḷadīpe chasaṭṭhimattānaṃ rājūnaṃ pūraṇakāle
anya-e0702n:203_2: buddhaghoso nāma thero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā sīhaḷabhāsāya likhite aṭṭhakathāganthe māgadhabhāsāya parivattitvā likhi.
anya-e0702n:204_0: So pana mahānāma rājā amhākaṃ marammaraṭṭhe siripaccayanagare savilaññikrovi nāmakena raññā samakālo hutvā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:204_2: Nāmakena raññā samakālo hutvā rajjaṃ kāresīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n:205_0: Sīhaḷadīpe pana kittissirimegho nāma rājā hutvā navame vasse tasmiṃyeva dīpe rājūnaṃ dvāsaṭṭhimattānaṃ
anya-e0702n:205_1: pūraṇakāle jinacakke tiṃsādhike aṭṭhasatavasse jambudīpe kaliṅgapurato kuhasivassa nāma rañño jāmātā
anya-e0702n:205_2: dantakumāro hemamālaṃ nāma rājadhītaṃ gahetvā dāṭhādhātuṃ thenetvā navāya taritvā sīhaḷadīpaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:205_3: Jinacakke tiṃsādhikaaṭṭhavassasate jeṭṭhatissarājā navavassāni rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:206_0: Buddhadāsarājā ekūnatiṃsati vassāni upalissarājā cadvicattālīsavassāni mahānāmarājā dvāvīsavassānīti
anya-e0702n:207_0: Tasmiñca kāle yadā dvīhi vassehi ūnaṃ ahosi,
anya-e0702n:207_1: tadā mahānāmarañño kāle tiṃsādhikanavavassasatamatte sāsane buddhaghoso nāma thero laṅkādīpaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:208_0: Amarapuramāpakassa rañño kāle sīhaḷadīpikehi bhikkhūhi pesitasannesapaṇṇe pana chapaṇṇāsādhikanavavassasatātikkante sūti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n:209_0: Ettha ṭhatvā buddhaghosattherassa aṭṭhuppattiṃsaṅkhepamattaṃ vakkhāma. Kathaṃ.
anya-e0702n:209_1: Sīhaḷabhāsakkharehi parivattitaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ māgadhasāsakkharena ko nāma puggalo parivattituṃ sakkhissatīti
anya-e0702n:209_2: mahātherā nimantayitvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā ghosaṃ devaputtaṃ disvā saddhiṃ sakkena devānamindena
anya-e0702n:209_3: taṃ yācitvā bodhirukkhasamīpe ghosagāme kesassa nāma brāhmaṇassa kesiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0702n:209_5: Khādatha bhonto pivatha bhontotiādinā brāhmaṇānaṃ aññamaññaṃ ghosakāle vijāyanattā ghosoti nāmaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:209_6: Sattavassikakāle so tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi.
anya-e0702n:210_0: Atha kho ekena arahantena saddhiṃ vedakathaṃ sallapanto taṃ kathaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā kusalā dhammā akusalā
anya-e0702n:210_1: dhammā abyākatā dhammātiādinā paramatthavedaṃ nāma buddhamantaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0702n:210_2: Tadā so sutvā uggaṇhitukāmo hutvā tassa arahantassa santike pabbajitvā devasikaṃ devasikaṃ piṭakattayaṃ saṭṭhimattehi padasahassehi sajjhāyaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0702n:211_0: Tato paccā raho ekakova nisinnassa etadahosi,–
anya-e0702n:211_1: buddhabhāsite piṭakattaye mama vā paññā adhikā,
anya-e0702n:211_3: Taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā upajjhācariyo niggahaṃ katvā ovadi.
anya-e0702n:211_5: Upajjhācariyo tvaṃ āvuso sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā piṭakattayaṃ sīhaḷassāsakkharena likhitaṃ māgadhabhāsakkharena likhāhi,
anya-e0702n:212_0: Buddhaghoso ca pitaraṃ micchādiṭṭhibhāvato mocetvā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sirasā paṭiggahetvā piṭakattayaṃ likhituṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ nāvāya agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:212_1: Tadā samuddamajjhe tīhi divasehi tarante buddhadattatthero ca sīhaḷadīpato nāvāya āgacchanto antarāmagge
anya-e0702n:212_2: devāna ānubhāvena aññamaññaṃ passitvā kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā jāni.
anya-e0702n:212_4: mayā āvuso kato jinālaṅkāro appassāroti maññitvā piṭakattayaṃ parivattituṃ likhituṃ okāsaṃ nādāsuṃ,
anya-e0702n:212_5: tvaṃ pana piṭakattayaṃ saṃvaṇṇehīti vatvā attano sakkena devānamindena dinnaṃ haritakiphalaṃ ayomayalekhana
anya-e0702n:212_7: Evaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ therānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sallapantānaṃyeva nāvā sayameva apanetvā gacchiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:213_0: Buddhaghosatthero ca sīhaḷadīpaṃ patvā paṭhamaṃ saṅghapālattheraṃ passitvā piṭakattayaṃ māgadhabhāsakkharena
anya-e0702n:213_1: parivattetuṃ āgatomhīti kāraṇaṃ ārocetvā sīhaḷabhikkhū ca sīle patiṭṭhāyātiādigāthaṃ niyyādetvā imissā
anya-e0702n:213_2: gāthāya atthaṃ piṭakattayaṃ āloletvā saṃvaṇṇehīti uyyojesuṃ,
anya-e0702n:213_3: tasmiṃyeva divase sāyanhakālato paṭṭhāya yathāvuttagāthaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā visuddhimaggaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:213_4: Katvā taṃ kammaṃ nipphādetvā tassa ñāṇappabhavaṃ vīmaṃsetukāmo devānamindo tañca ganthaṃ antaradhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:213_9: Tiṇṇampi ganthānaṃ aññamaññaṃ ekapadamattenapi visesatā natthi saṅghapālatthero ca taṃ ārādhayitvā piṭakattayaṃ niyyādesi.
anya-e0702n:213_10: Evaṃ visuddhimagge saṅghapālattherassa yācanaṃ ārabbha visuddhimaggo katoti āgataṃ.
anya-e0702n:213_11: Buddhaghosuppattikathāyaṃ pana saṅgharājattherassa āyācanaṃ ārabbhāti āgataṃ.
anya-e0702n:215_1: Buddhaghosatthero nāma mahābodhirukkhasamīpe ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇagāme vijāto tiṇṇampi vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi tesu tesu vādesu ca aticheko.
anya-e0702n:215_2: So aññehi ca saddhiṃ pucchābyākaraṇakammaṃ kattukāmo jambunīpatale āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ vihāraṃ patvā tasmiṃ vā āgantukabhāvena nisīdi.
anya-e0702n:215_3: Tasmiñca vihāre revato nāma thero vasi.
anya-e0702n:215_4: Tena therena saddhiṃ bhallapanto so brāhmaṇamāṇavo tīsu vedesu aloletvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0702n:215_6: Therassa pana pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ māṇavo na sakkā byākātuṃ.
anya-e0702n:215_7: Atha māṇavo pucchi,–ko nāmāyaṃ bhante mantoti.
anya-e0702n:215_8: Buddhamanto nāmāyanti vutte uggaṇhitukāmo hutvā therassa santike pabbajitvā piṭakattayaṃ uggaṇhi.
anya-e0702n:215_10: Buddhasseva ghoso yassa atthīti buddhaghosoti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n:216_0: Buddhaghoso ca āyasmato revatassa santike nisīdanto ñāṇodayaṃ nāma ganthaṃ aṭṭhassāliniñca nāma ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:216_1: Tato pacchā parittaṭṭhakathaṃ kattukāmo hutvā ārabhi.
anya-e0702n:216_6: teneva mahāmahindhattherena ānitā aṭṭhakathā tīsu ca saṅgītīsu āruḷo pāḷiyo sāriputtattherādīhi desito kathāmaggo sīhaḷadīpe atthi,
anya-e0702n:216_7: tvaṃ gantvā māgadhabhāsakkharena likhehīti uyyojiyamāno buddhaghosatthero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā anurādhapure
anya-e0702n:216_8: mahāvihāraṃ pavisitvā saṅghapālattherassa santike saddhiṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāya theravāde sutvā aṭṭhakathaṃ
anya-e0702n:216_10: Sīhaḷabhikkhū ca pubbe vuttanayeneva sīle patiṭṭhāyātiādi gāthā niyyādesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:216_11: Buddhaghoso ca saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya piṭakattayaṃ saṅkhipitvā visuddhimaggaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:217_0: Pubbe vuttanayeneva sakko antaradhāpetvā tikkhattuṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n:218_0: Kiñcāpi nānā ganthesu nānākārehi buddhaghosuppatti āgatā,
anya-e0702n:218_1: tathāpi buddhaghosattherassa sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā piṭakattayassa likhanaṃ aṭṭhakathānañca karaṇameva pamāṇanti manokiliṭṭhaṃ na uppādetabbanti.
anya-e0702n:219_0: Iccevaṃ pāḷibhāsāya pariyattiṃ parivattitvā pacchā ācariyaparamparasissānusissavasena sīhaḷadīpe jinacakkaṃ majjhanti kaṃsumāsī viya atidibbati,
anya-e0702n:219_2: sabbapāliphullena tiyojanikapāricchattakarukkhena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ viya satapattapadumādīhi mahāpokkharaṇī
anya-e0702n:219_5: thokaṃ āgametvā piṇḍāya patiṭṭhamānapadesepi maggaphalāni labhiṃsuyeva.
anya-e0702n:220_0: Maggaphalāni sacchikarontānaṃ puggalānaṃ bāhullatāya ayaṃ puthujjano ayaṃ puthujjanoti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo hoti.
anya-e0702n:220_1: Ekasmiṃ kāle sīhaḷadīpe puthujjana bhikkhu nāma natthi.
anya-e0702n:221_0: Abhiññālābhīnaṃ kira mahiddhikānaṃ gamanāgamanavasena sūriyossāsaṃ alabhitvā dhaññakoṭṭakā mātugāmā dhaññakoṭṭituṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:222_0: Devalokato sumanasāmaṇero dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ anetvā tassa pāṭihāriyaṃ dassanavasena uddhakabindhūhi
anya-e0702n:222_1: tiyojanasataṃ sakalampi laṅkādīpaṃ byāpatvā bhagavatā paribhuttacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ viya hutvā navāya gacchantā
anya-e0702n:222_2: mahāsamudde udakato nāḷikeramattampi disvā sakalaṅkādīpaṃ pūjenti,
anya-e0702n:222_3: mahāmahindattherassa santike ariṭṭhattherena saddhiṃ pañcamattā bhikkhusatā paṭhamaṃ tāva vinayapiṭakaṃ
anya-e0702n:222_4: uggaṇhiṃsūti imehi kāraṇehi laṅkādīpaṃ jinacakkassa patiṭṭhānaṃ hutvā varadīpanti nāmaṃ paṭilabhi.
anya-e0702n:223_0: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva piṭakattayaṃ potthakāruḷavasena patiṭṭhāpetvā tato pacchā coranāgassa nāma rañño kāle
anya-e0702n:223_1: sakalalaṅkādīpaṃ dubbhikkhabhayena pīḷetvā piṭakattayaṃ dhārentā bhikkhū jambudīpaṃ āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:223_2: Anāgantvā tattheva ṭhitāpi bhikkhū chātakabhayena pīḷetvā udarapaṭalaṃ bandhitvā kucchiṃ vālukarāsimhi ṭhapetvā piṭakattayaṃ dhāresuṃ.
anya-e0702n:224_0: Kuṭa kaṇṇatissassa rañño kāleyeva dubbhikkhabhayaṃ vūpasamitvā jambudīpato bhikkhū puna gantvā sīhaḷadīpe
anya-e0702n:224_1: ṭhitehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ mahāvihāre piṭakattayaṃ avirodhāpetvā samasamaṃ katvā ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:224_2: Ṭhapetvā ca pana sīhaḷadīpeyeva suṭṭhu dhāresuṃ.
anya-e0702n:225_0: Tattheva aṭṭhakathāyo buddhaghosatthero māgadhabhāsāya parivattetvā viraci.
anya-e0702n:226_2: So ca ācariyadhammapālatthero sīhaḷadīpassa samīpe damilaraṭṭhe badaratitthamhi nivāsitattā sīhaḷadīpeyeva saṅgahetvā vattabbo.
anya-e0702n:227_3: Sā ca sabbāsaṃ ṭīkānaṃ ādibhūtattā mūlaṭīkāti pākaṭā.
anya-e0702n:228_0: Visuddhimaggassa mahāṭīkaṃ dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkaṃ majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0702n:229_0: Sāratthadīpaniṃ nāma vinayaṭīkaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṭīkañca parakkamabāhuraññā yācito sāriputtatthero akāsi.
anya-e0702n:230_1: Sā ca mūlaṭīkāya anuttānatthāni uttānāni saṃvaṇṇitattā anuṭīkā tivuccati.
anya-e0702n:231_0: Visuddhimaggassa cūḷaṭīkaṃ makhudīpaniñca aññetarā therā akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:231_1: Sā ca mūlaṭīkāya atthāvasesāti ca anuttānatthāti ca katvā mūlaṭīkāya saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā katattā madhura sattā ca madhudīpaninti vuccati.
anya-e0702n:232_0: Ābhidhammāvatāraṃ pana rupārūpavibhāgaṃ vinayavinicchayañca buddha dattatthero.
anya-e0702n:232_6: Te ca saṅkhepato saṃvaṇṇitattā sukhena ca lakkhaṇiyattā lakkhaṇaganthāti vuccanti.
anya-e0702n:233_0: Tesaṃ pana saṃvaṇṇanāsu abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa porāṇaṭīkaṃ navavimalabuddhitthero akāsi.
anya-e0702n:235_2: Te ca padakkamena asaṃvaṇṇetvā anuttānatthāyeva saṃvaṇṇitattā gaṇṭhipadatthāti vuccanti.
anya-e0702n:237_0: Mahāvaṃsaṃ cūḷavaṃsaṃ dīpavaṃsaṃ thūpavaṃsaṃ bodhivaṃsaṃ dhātuvaṃ sañca sīhaḷadīpavāsino therā.
anya-e0702n:237_2: Ete ca pāḷimuttakavasena vuttattā ganthantarāti vuccanti.
anya-e0702n:238_0: Iccevaṃ buddhaghosādayo thera varā yathābalaṃ yathāsattiṃ pariyattiṃ sāsanaṃ upatthambhetvā bahūhi mūlehi
anya-e0702n:238_1: bahuhisākhāhi bahūhi ca viṭapehi upatthambhiyamāno vepullamā pajjamāno mahānigrodharukkho viya thiraṃ
anya-e0702n:239_0: Idaṃ sīhaḷadīpe potthakāruḷhato pacchā sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n:249_1: Idāni yathāṭhapitamātikāvasena suvaṇṇabhūmi raṭṭhe sāsanavaṃsakathāmaggassa vatthuṃ okāso anuppattho,
anya-e0702n:250_0: Tattha suvaṇṇabhūmīti tīsu rāmaññaraṭṭhesu ekassa nāmaṃ.
anya-e0702n:250_1: Tīṇihi rāmaññaraṭṭhāni honti haṃsāvatīmuttimasuvaṇṇabhūmivasena ekadesena sabbampi rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:250_2: Tattha pana ukkalāpajanapade tapussabhallike ādiṃ katvā bhagavato abhisambujjhitvā sattasattāhesu atikkantesuyeva
anya-e0702n:250_3: āsāḷhimāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamadivasato paṭṭhāya rāmaññaraṭṭhe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhati.
anya-e0702n:252_0: Bhagavato abhisambuddhakālato pubbeyeva aparaṇṇakaraṭṭhe subhinnanagare tissarañño kāle ekassa amaccassa tisso jayo cāti dveputtā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:252_1: Te gihibhāve saṃvegaṃ labhitvā mahāsamuddassa samīpe gajjagirimhi nāma pabbate itthusipabbaṃ pabbajitvā nisīdisuṃ.
anya-e0702n:252_2: Tadā nāgiyā vijjādharo santavaṃ katvā dve aṇḍāni vijāyitvā sā nāgī lajjāya tāni vijahitvā gacchi.
anya-e0702n:253_0: Tadā jeṭṭho tissakumāro tāni labhitvā kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ vibhajitvā ekaṃ ekassa santike ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n:253_1: Kāle atikkante tehi aṇḍehi dve manussā vijāyiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:253_2: Te dasa vassavaye sampatte kaniṭṭhassa aṇḍato vijāyanadaharo kālaṃ katvā majjhimadese mithilanagare gavaṃpati nāma kumāro upajji.
anya-e0702n:253_3: So sattavassikakāle buddhassa bhagavato santike niyyādetvā pabbājetvā acireneva arahā ahosi.
anya-e0702n:254_0: Jeṭṭhassa pana aṇḍato vijāyanadaharo dvādasavassikakāle sakko devānamindo āgantvā rāmaññaraṭṭhe sudhammapuraṃ
anya-e0702n:254_1: nāma nagaraṃ māpetvā sīharājāti nāmena tattha rajjaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n:254_3: Gavaṃpatitthero ca attanā mātaraṃ daṭṭhukāmo mithilanagarato āgantuṃ ārabhi.
anya-e0702n:254_4: Tadā dibbacakkhunā mātuyā kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ ñatvā idāni me mātā kuhiṃ uppajjatīti āvajjanto bāhullena nesādakevaṭṭānaṃ
anya-e0702n:254_5: nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūte dese uppajjatīti ñatvā sacāhaṃ gantvā na ovādeyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:254_6: mātā me apāyagamaniyaṃ apuññaṃ vicinitvā catūsu apāyesu uppajjeyyāti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ yācitvā rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ vehāsamaggena āgacchi.
anya-e0702n:254_7: Rāmaññaraṭṭhe sudhammaparaṃ patvā attano bhātunā sīharājena saddhiṃ raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:255_3: tīsu pana bhavesu sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ makuṭasaṅkāso gotamo nāma mayhaṃ satthā atthi,
anya-e0702n:255_5: Evaṃ pana bhante sati tumhākaṃ ācariyaṃ mayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ arahāma vā no vāti pucchi.
anya-e0702n:255_6: Gavaṃpatittheroca āma mahārāja arahatha bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ,
anya-e0702n:255_7: ahaṃ yācitvā āgacchāmīti vatvā bhagavantaṃ yāci.
anya-e0702n:255_8: Bhagavā ca abhisambujjhitvā aṭṭhame vasse saddhiṃ anekasatabhikkhūhi rāmaññaraṭṭhe sukhammapuraṃ ākāsena āgamāsi.
anya-e0702n:255_11: Ettha ca yasmā bhagavā saparisoyeva āgacchi,
anya-e0702n:255_13: tasmā nānā vādataṃ paṭicca cittassākulitā na uppādetabbāti.
anya-e0702n:256_0: Atha āgantvā ratanamaṇḍape nisīditvā sarājikānaṃ raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ amatarasaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n:256_1: Tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:256_2: Atha bhagavā dassanatthāya āgatānaṃ channaṃ tāpasānaṃ cha kesadhātuyo pūjanatthāya adāsi.
anya-e0702n:256_3: Tato pacchāsattatiṃsavassāni pūretvā parinibbānakālepi bhagavato adhiṭṭhānānurūpena citakaṭṭhānato tettiṃsa
anya-e0702n:256_4: dante gahetvā gavaṃpatitthero sudhammapuraṃ ānetvā sīharañño datvā tettiṃsacetiyāni patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:256_5: Evaṃ bhagavato parinibbānato aṭṭhameyeva vasse gavaṃpatitthero rāmañña raṭṭhe sudhammapure sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:258_0: Bhagavato parinibbutapañcatiṃsādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ satānaṃ uparisuvaṇṇabhūmiṃ nāma rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ āgantvā
anya-e0702n:258_1: soṇatthero uttarattherocāti dve therā pañcavaggakammārahehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:258_2: Te ca therā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherassa saddhivihārikāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatā.
anya-e0702n:259_0: Tapussabhallike gavaṃpatittherañca paṭicca sāsanaṃ tāva patiṭṭhahi.
anya-e0702n:259_1: Tañca na sabbena sabbaṃ ogāhetvā ye ye pana saddhā pasannā,
anya-e0702n:259_2: te te attano icchāvaseneva sāsanaṃ pasīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:259_3: Pacchā pana soṇuttarattherā mahussāhena ācariya āṇattiyā sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya ussukkaṃ āpannā patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:259_4: Tena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti kāritapaccayavasena āṇattivibhattivasenaca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n:260_0: Tadā pana suvaṇṇabhūmiraṭṭhe sudhammapure sirimāsoko nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:260_1: Tañca sudhammapuraṃ nāma kelāsapabbatamuddhani dakkhiṇāya anudisāya pubbaḍḍhabhāgena pabbatamuddhani aparaḍḍhabhāgena bhūmitale tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0702n:260_2: Taṃyeva guḷapācakānaṃ massānaṃ gehasadisāni gehāni yebhuyyena,
anya-e0702n:260_4: Tassa pana nagarassa mahāsamuddasamīpe ṭhitattā dakayakkhinī sabbadā āgantvā rājagehe jāte jāte kumāre khādi.
anya-e0702n:261_0: Soṇuttarattherānaṃ sampattadivasayeva rājagehe ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
anya-e0702n:261_1: Dakayakkhinīca khādissāmīti saha pañcahi yakkhinisatehi āgatā.
anya-e0702n:261_2: Taṃ disvā manussā bhāyitvā mahāviravaṃ ravanti.
anya-e0702n:261_3: Tadā therā bhayānakaṃ sīhasīsavasena ekasīsasarīradvayasambandhasaṇṭhānaṃ manusīharūpaṃ māpetvā dassetvā taṃ yakkhiniṃ saparisaṃ palāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:262_0: Therā ca puna yakkhiniyā anāgamanatthāya parittaṃ akaṃsutasmiñca samāgame āgatānaṃ manussānaṃ brahmajālasuttaṃ adesayyuṃ.
anya-e0702n:265_0: Tato paṭṭhāya rājakumārānaṃ soṇuttaranāmehiyeva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:265_1: Avasesadvārakānampi rakkhasabhayato vimocanatthaṃ tālapattabhujapattesu therehi māpitaṃ manusīharūpaṃ dassetvā matthake ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:265_2: Manussāca silāmayaṃ manusīharūpaṃ katvā sudhammapurassa esanne padese ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:265_4: Iccevaṃ bhagavato parinibbānato pañcatiṃsādhike dvivassasate sampatte soṇuttarattherā āgantvā sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n:267_0: Tato pacchā chasatādhike sahasse sampatte pubbe vuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi sāsanassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n:267_1: dāmarikacorabhayena pajjararogabhayena sāsanapaccatthikabhayenacāti tīhi bhayehi ākulitaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n:267_2: Tadā ca tattha sāsanaṃ dubbalaṃ ahosi,
anya-e0702n:267_3: yathā udake mande tatrajātaṃ uppalaṃ uppalaṃ dubbalanti.
anya-e0702n:267_4: Tattha bhikkhūpi sāsanaṃ yathā kāmaṃ pūretuṃ na sakkā.
anya-e0702n:268_0: Sūriyakumārassa nāma manoharirañño pana kāle sāsanaṃ ativiya dubbalaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n:268_1: Jinacakke ekachasatādhike vassasahasse sampatte kaliyugeca ekūnavīsatādhike catuvassasate sampatte arimaddananagare
anya-e0702n:268_2: anuruddhā nāma rājā tato saha piṭakena bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ānesi.
anya-e0702n:269_0: Tato pacchā jinacakke navādhike sattasate sahasse ca sampatte laṅkādīpe sirisaṅghabodhiparakkamabāhumahārājā sāsanaṃ sodhesi.
anya-e0702n:270_0: Tato channaṃ vassānaṃ upari kaliyuge dvattiṃsādhike pañcasate sampatte uttarājīvo nāma thero sāsane pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n:272_0: So pana prānadassitthero lokiyābhiññāyo labhitvā niccaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pātova magadharaṭṭhe uruvelanigame mahābodhiṃ
anya-e0702n:272_1: gantvā mahābodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā puna āgantvā sudhammapure piṇḍāya cari.
anya-e0702n:272_3: Ayañca attho sudhammapurato magadharaṭṭhaṃ gantvā uruvelanigame vāṇijakammaṃ karontā tadākāraṃ passitvā
anya-e0702n:273_0: Tasmiñca kāle uttarājīvatthero paripuṇṇavīsativassena chappadena nāma sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ gacchi.
anya-e0702n:273_1: Sīhaḷadīpavāsino ca bhikkhū mayaṃ mahāmahindattherassa vaṃsikā bhavāma,
anya-e0702n:273_3: tasmā mayaṃ ekavaṃsikā bhavāma samāna vādikāti vatvā chappadasāmaṇerassa upasampadakammaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:273_4: Tato pacchā cetiya vandanādīni kammāni niṭṭhāpetvā uttarājīvatthero saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅkhena arimaddananagaraṃ paccāgamāhi.
anya-e0702n:274_3: tena hi sīhaḷadīpeyeva vasitvā pariyattimuggahetvā paccāgamissāmīti.
anya-e0702n:275_0: Tato ācariyassa okāsaṃ yācitvā sīhaḷadīpeyeva paṭivasi.
anya-e0702n:275_1: Sīhaḷadīpe vasitvā yāva laddhattherasammutikā pariyattiṃ pariyāpuṇitvā puna jambudīpaṃ paccāgantukāmo ahosi.
anya-e0702n:275_3: ahaṃ ekakova gacchanto sace mama ācariyo natthi,
anya-e0702n:275_4: sacepi jambudīpavāsinā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kātuṃ na iccheyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:275_5: evaṃ sati visuṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkūṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:275_6: tasmā piṭakadharehi catūhi therehi saddhiṃ gacceyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:276_0: Evaṃ pana cintetvā tāmalittigāmavāsinā sivalittherena kambojarañño puttabhūtena tāmalindattherena kiñcipuravāsinā
anya-e0702n:276_1: ānandattherena rāhulattherenacāti imehi catūhi therehi saddhiṃ nāvāya paccāgacchi.
anya-e0702n:276_2: Te ca therā piṭakadharā ahesuṃ dakkhā thāmasampannā ca.
anya-e0702n:276_4: Kusimanagaraṃ sampattakāle upakaṭṭhavassūpagamanakālo hutvā arimaddananagare ācariyassa santikaṃ asampāpuṇitvā kusimanagarayeva vassaṃ upagamiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:276_5: Tesaṃ vassūpagamanavihāravatthu ārāmapākāro ca kusimanagarassa dakkhiṇadisāsāge yāvajjatanā atthi.
anya-e0702n:277_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle pana mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā te pañca therā arimaddananagaraṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:277_1: Uttarājīvattheroca arimaddananagara vāsīhi bhikkhūhi visuṃ hutvā saṅghakammāni akāsi.
anya-e0702n:277_2: Kiñcāpi cettha uttarājīvattherādayo sīhaḷadīpato paccāgantvā arimaddananagare vasitvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesuṃ,
anya-e0702n:277_3: rāmaññaraṭṭhe pana jātattā pubbe ca tattha nivāsattā idha dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0702n:278_0: Tasmiñca kāle dalanagare padīpajeyyagāme jāto sāriputto nāma mahallakassamaṇero eko arimaddananagaraṃ
anya-e0702n:278_1: gantvā ānandattherassa santike upasampajjitvā pariyatti pariyapuṇi.
anya-e0702n:278_2: So bahussuto ahosi dakkho thāmasampanno ca.
anya-e0702n:278_6: Rājā evaṃ cintetvā rājapurise pesetvā vīmaṃsāpesi.
anya-e0702n:278_7: Rājapurisā ca tassa chinnapādaṅguṭṭhaggataṃ passitvā tamatthaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:278_8: Rājā taṃ sutvā evaṃ vikalaṅgapaccaṅgo bhaveyya,
anya-e0702n:278_9: padhānācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ na yuttoti katvā padhānācariyabhāvaṃ na akāsi.
anya-e0702n:278_11: Ekasmiñca kāle dhammavilāsoti lañchaṃ datvā rāmaññaraṭṭhe sāsanaṃ sodhetvā parisuddhaṃ karohīti rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n:279_0: Soca rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā dalanagare bahunaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhamma vinayaṃ vācetvā sāsanaṃ paggahesi.
anya-e0702n:279_1: Tattha ca rāmaññamanussā tassa dhammavilāsattherassa sissānusissā sīhaḷabhikkhu gaṇāti vohāranti.
anya-e0702n:279_2: Iccevaṃ sīhaḷadīpikassa ānandattherassa sissaṃ dhammavilāsaṃ paṭicca rāmaññaraṭṭhe sīhaḷadīpato sāsanassa āgatamaggoti.
anya-e0702n:281_0: Tasmiñca kāle muttimanagare aggamahesiyā ācariyā buddhavaṃsattheramahānāgattherā sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā mahāhāravāsigaṇavaṃsabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0702n:281_1: bhikkhūnaṃ santike puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhitvā muttimanagaraṃ paccāgantvā muttimanagaravāsīti bhikkhūhi visuṃ
anya-e0702n:281_3: Teca there paṭicca rāmaññaraṭṭhe puna sīhaḷadīpato sāsanaṃ āgatanti.
anya-e0702n:283_0: Tato pacchāca muttimanagare setibhindassa rañño mātuyā ācariyo medhaṅkaro nāma thero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā
anya-e0702n:283_1: sīhaḷadīpe araññavāsīnaṃ mahātherānaṃ santike puna sikkhaṃ gahetvā pariyattiṃ pariyāpuṇitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaye
anya-e0702n:283_2: tipusīsacchanne setibhindassa rañño mātuyā kārāvite vihāre nisiditvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesi.
anya-e0702n:283_4: Athāparimpi muttimanagareyeva suvaṇṇasobhaṇo nāma thero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā mahāvihāravāsigaṇavaṃsabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0702n:283_5: therānaṃ santike puna sikkhaṃ gahetvā muttimanagarameva paccāgacchi.
anya-e0702n:284_1: Dhutaṅgadharo ca ahosi appiccho santuṭṭho lajjī kukkuccako sikkhā kāmo dakkho thāmasampanno ca.
anya-e0702n:284_2: Sīhaḷadīpe kalambumhi nāma jātassare udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ atirekapañcavaggena vanaratanaṃ nāma saṅgharājaṃ
anya-e0702n:284_3: upajjhāyaṃ katvā rāhulabhaddaṃ nāma vijayabāhurañño ācariyabhūtaṃ theraṃ kammavācācariyaṃ katvā upasampajji.
anya-e0702n:284_4: Soca thero punāgantvā muttimanagareyeva vasitvā gaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesi.
anya-e0702n:284_5: Ete ca dve there paṭicca rāmaññaraṭṭhe sīhaḷadīpato sāsanaṃ āgataṃ.
anya-e0702n:286_0: Tato pacchā sāsanavasena dvivassādhike dvisahasse kaliyugato ekāsītike sampatte haṃsāvatīnagare siriparamamahādhammarājāti
anya-e0702n:286_1: laddhanāmo dhammacetiyarājā kusimamaṇḍale haṃsāvatīmaṇḍale muttimamaṇḍale ca raṭṭhavāsino sapajaṃviya
anya-e0702n:286_3: So ca rājā tīsu piṭakesu catūsu ca vedesu byākaraṇacchandālaṅkārādīsu ca cheko sikkhitanānāsippo nānābhāsāsu
anya-e0702n:286_4: ca pasuto saddhāsīlādiguṇopeto kumudakundasaradacandikāsamānasitapajapatibhūto ca sāsane ca atippasanno ahosi.
anya-e0702n:287_3: Evañca pana cintetvā sīmavinicchayaṃ tassaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ vinayasaṅgahaṃ tassaṃvaṇṇanaṃ sīmālaṅkāra sīmasaṅgahañca
anya-e0702n:287_4: saddato atthato ca punappunaṃ upaparikkhitvā aññamaññaṃ saṃsanditvā pubbāparaṃ tulayitvā bhagavato adhippāyo
anya-e0702n:287_5: īdiso ganthakārānaṃ adhippāyo īdisoti passitvā amhākaṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhe baddhanadīsamuddajātessarādayo sīmāyo
anya-e0702n:287_6: bahukāpi samānā ayaṃ parisuddhāti vavatthapetuṃ dukkaraṃ,
anya-e0702n:287_7: evaṃ sati sīmaparisāparisuddhā bhavituṃ dukkarāti paṭibhāti.
anya-e0702n:288_0: Tato pacchā rāmaññaraṭṭhe tipiṭakadharabyattappaṭibalattherehi mantetvā rañño paṭibhānānurūpaṃ sīmaparisā
anya-e0702n:289_1: ahovata sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassāni patiṭṭhatissatīti ganthesu vuttopi samāno abhisambuddhato
anya-e0702n:289_2: catusaṭṭhādhikadvisahassamatteneva kālena sāsane malaṃ hutvā upasampadakamme kaṅkhāṭṭhānaṃ tāva uppajji,
anya-e0702n:289_3: kathaṃ pana pañcavassasahassāni sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti.
anya-e0702n:289_4: Evaṃ dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā punāpi evaṃ cintesi,-
anya-e0702n:289_5: evaṃ ettakaṃ sāsane malaṃ dissamānopi samāno upasampadakamme kaṅkhāṭṭhānaṃ dissamānopi samāno parisuddhatthāya
anya-e0702n:289_6: anārabhitvā mādiso appossukko majjhatto nisīdituṃ ayutto,
anya-e0702n:289_7: evañhi sati bhagavati saddho pasannomhīti vattabbataṃ anāpajjeyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:290_0: Kuto nukho dāni sāsanaṃ āharitvā thiraṃ patiṭṭhā peyyanti āvajjanto evaṃ cintesi,-
anya-e0702n:290_1: bhagavato kira parinibbānato chattiṃsādhike dvisate sampatte mahāmoggali puttatissatthero mahāmahindattheraṃ pesetvā sīhaḷadīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0702n:290_2: tadā devānaṃ piyatissarājā mahāvihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi,
anya-e0702n:290_3: sāsanavarañca ekāsitādhikāni dvivassasatāni vimalaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahi,
anya-e0702n:290_5: tato pacchā abhayagirivāsije tavanavāsivasena dvedhā hutvā bhijji,
anya-e0702n:290_6: jinacakke aṭṭhasattasatādhike sahasse sampatte sirisaṅghabodhiparakkamabāhumahārājā udumbaragirivāsi
anya-e0702n:290_7: mahākassapattherappamukhaṃ mahāvihāra vāsigaṇaṃ anuggahetvā yathāvutte dvegaṇe visodhesi,
anya-e0702n:290_9: tato pacchā vijayabāhuparakkamabāhurājūnaṃ dvinnaṃ kālepi sāsanaṃ nimmalaṃ hutvāyeva aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0702n:290_10: teneva byattappaṭibalabhikkhū āyācitvā sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhā pessāmi,
anya-e0702n:290_11: tesaṃ pana paramparavasena pavattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena amhākaṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhe sāsanaṃ nimmalaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahissatīti.
anya-e0702n:290_12: Evaṃ pana cintetvā moggalānattheraṃ somattherañca sīhaḷadīpaṃ gamanatthāya yāci.
anya-e0702n:291_0: Rājā ca dāṭhādhātupūjanatthāya bhikkhusaṅghassa pūjanatthāya bhūvanekabāhurañño paṇṇākāratthāya deyyadhammapaṇṇākāravatthūni
anya-e0702n:291_1: paṭiyādetvā citradūtaṃ rāmadūtanti ime dve amacce dvīsu nāvāsu nāyakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā kaliyuge sattatiṃsādhike
anya-e0702n:291_2: aṭṭhavassasate sampatte māghamāsassa puṇṇamito ekādasamiyaṃ sūravāre citradūtaṃ saddhiṃ moggalānattherappamukhehi
anya-e0702n:292_0: Rāmadūtaṃ pana tasmiṃyeva vasse māghamāsassa puṇṇamito dvādasamiyaṃ candavāre saddhiṃ somattherappamukhehi bhikkhūhi ekāya nāvāya gamāpesi.
anya-e0702n:292_1: Ujukaṃ pana vātaṃ alabhitvā citramāsassa juṇhapakkhanavamiyaṃ sīhaḷadīpe valligāmaṃ pāyāsi.
anya-e0702n:293_0: Tato pacchā tepi dve amaccā dvīsu nāvāsu ābhatāni dātabbapaṇṇākāravatthūni sandesapaṇṇāni ca bhūvanekabāhurañño bhikkhūsaṅghassa ca adāsi.
anya-e0702n:293_1: Raññā pesitabhikkhūnañca sandesapaṇṇe kathitaniyāmeneva kalyāṇiyaṃ nāma nadiyaṃ udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0702n:294_0: Upasampajjitvā ca bhūvanekabāhurājā nānāppakāre bhikkhūnaṃ sāruppe parikkhāre datvā idaṃ pana āmisadānaṃ
anya-e0702n:294_2: nāmalañchaṃ pana na jīrissatīti katvā rāmadūtassa nāvāya pakhānabhūtassa somattherassa sirisaṅghabodhisāmīti nāmaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n:294_3: Avasesānaṃ pana dasannaṃ therānaṃ kittisirimeghasāmi parakkamabāhusāmi buddhaghosasāmi sīhaḷadīpavisuddhasāmi
anya-e0702n:294_4: guṇaratanadharasāmī jinālaṅkārasāmi ratanamālisāmi saddhammatejasāmi dhammarāmasāmi bhūvanekabāhusāmīti
anya-e0702n:295_0: Citradūtassa nāvāya pakhānabhūtassa moggalānattherassa dhammakittilokagarusāmīti nāmaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n:295_1: Avasesānaṃ pana sirivanaratanasāmi maṅgalattherassāmi kalyāṇatissassāmi candagirisāmi siridantadhātusāmi
anya-e0702n:295_2: vanavāsitissasāmi ratanalaṅkārasāmi mahādevasāmi udumbaragirisāmi cūḷābhayatissasāmīti nāmāni adāsi.
anya-e0702n:295_3: Bāvīsatiyā pana pacchā samaṇānaṃ nāmaṃ na adāsi.
anya-e0702n:296_0: Tato pacchā cetiyapūjanādīni katvā taṃtaṃkiccaṃ nipphādetvā puna āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:296_4: Evaṃ pana vatvā pacchā āgamanakāle caṇḍavātabhayena mahāsamuddamajjhe nāvā avagacchati.
anya-e0702n:296_5: Tena sīhaḷaraññā pesitanāvāya sabbe sannipatitvā āruhitvā āgacchantā tīṇi divasāni atikkamitvā puna caṇḍavātabhayena
anya-e0702n:296_6: agambhīraṭṭhāne silāya ghaṭṭetvā laggitvā gantuṃ asakkuṇitvā ekaṃ uḷumpaṃ bandhitvā jaṅgheneva agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:296_7: Sīhaḷarañño ca dūto paṇṇākāraṃ datvā paccāgamāsi.
anya-e0702n:296_8: Bhikkhūsu ca bhikkhū antarāmaggeyeva maccu ādāya gacchati.
anya-e0702n:297_0: Imesaṃ pana āraddhaṃ, na kiccaṃ yāva niṭṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0702n:298_0: Na tāva ādiyissanti, maccu natthi āpekkhanā.
anya-e0702n:301_0: Rāmādhipatirājāca tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pattakāle haṃsāvatīnagarassa pacchimasmiṃ disābhāge narasūrena nāma
anya-e0702n:301_1: amaccena paribhutte gāmakhette pāḷiaṭṭhakathāḷīkādayo punappunaṃ passitvā upaparikkhitvā sīmasamūhanasīmasammutikammāni kārapesi.
anya-e0702n:301_2: Sīhaḷadīpe bhagavatā nhāyitapubbāya kalyāṇiyā nāma nadiyaṃ udakukkhepasīmaṃ katvā tattha mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
anya-e0702n:301_3: bhikkhūnaṃ santike upaladdhaupasampadabhāvehi bhikkhūhi katattā kalyāṇīsīmāti samaññaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:301_4: Iccevaṃ rāmādhipatirājā pattalaṅke bhikkhū nissāya sāsanaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:301_5: Kaliyugassa aṭṭhatiṃsādhikaaṭṭhavassasatakālato yāva ekacattālīsādhikaaṭṭhavassasatā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vaṃse asītimattā gaṇapāmokkhattherā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:301_6: Tesaṃ sissajātāni pana chabbisādhikāni dvisatāni catusahassāni dasasahassāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:301_7: Evaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhe vuḍḍhiṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhe vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullamāpajjiti.
anya-e0702n:303_0: Yadā pana arimaddananagare anuruddho nāma rājā sudhammapuraṃ sarājikaṃ abhibhavitvā viddhaṃsi,
anya-e0702n:303_7: mahānāgavaṃso ekoti chaggaṇā visuṃ visuṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu nānāsaṃvāsakā nānānikāyā.
anya-e0702n:304_0: Dhammacetiyaraññā pana kārāpitasāsanampi abhijjamānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:304_2: Haṃsāvatīmuttimasuvasena tīṇipi rāmaññaraṭṭhāni sunāparanta saṅkhātena ekābaddhāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0702n:304_4: Tasmā marammaraṭṭhato ekacce bhikkhū rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā kalyāṇīsīmāyaṃ puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:304_5: Dhammacetiyaraññākārāvitasāsanaṃ sakalaṃ marammaraṭṭhampi byāpetvā ogāhetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0702n:305_0: Rāmaññaraṭṭhe soṇuttarattherānaṃ sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva sudhammapure manohariraññā arahantānaṃ saṃvijjamānatā veditabbā.
anya-e0702n:305_1: Tato pacchā pana uttarā jīvāriyāvaṃsamahākāḷaprānadassittherānaṃ kāle lokiyajjhānābhiññālābhiyoyeva saṃvijjaṃsūti.
anya-e0702n:305_2: Adhunā pana tīsupi rāmaññaraṭṭhesu dhammacetiyaraññā kārāvitasāsanaṃyeva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0702n:305_3: Etthaca hetuphalasambandhavasena ādiantavasene ca sāsanavaṃsaṃ paññāya tulayitvā āditova dassitehi tīhi nayehi yathāpaveṇī ghaṭṭiyati,
anya-e0702n:306_0: Tāya ca theraparamparāya muttimanagaravāsimedhaṅkaratthero lokadīpakasāraṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:306_1: Haṃsāvatīnagaravāsī pana ānandatthero madhusāratthadīpaniṃ nāma abhidhammaṭīkāya saṃvaṇṇanaṃ,
anya-e0702n:306_4: tatheva aññataro thero apheggusāraṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:306_5: Evaṃ anekappakārānaṃ ganthakārānaṃ mahātherānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hutvā sāsanaṃ ogāhetvā virūḷaṭṭhānaṃahosīti.
anya-e0702n:310_2: Bhagavā hi veneyyahitāvaho yonakaraṭṭhe mamasāsanaṃ cirakālaṃ pabhiṭṭhahissatīti āpekkhitvā saddhiṃ bhikkhu
anya-e0702n:310_3: saṅghena desacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto labhuñjaṃ nāma nagaraṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:310_4: Tadā eko nesādo hariphalaṃ datvā taṃ paribhuñjitvā haribīje khipite pathaviyaṃ apatitvā ākāseyeva patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:310_7: Anāgate kho ānanda imasmiṃ ṭhāne mama dhātucetiyaṃ patiṭṭhahissati,
anya-e0702n:310_9: Bhagavatā pana hariphalassa bhuñjitaṭṭhānattāharibhuñjoti tassa raṭṭhassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n:310_10: Dvinnaṃ tāpasānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ jalasuttikaṃ paṭicca yonakānaṃ bhāsāya labhuñjoti nāmaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n:311_0: Tadā tattha mapinnāya nāma ekissā mātikāya samīpe nisinno eko lavakulikajeṭṭhako attano puttaṃ sattavassikaṃ bhagavato niyyādetvā pabbājesi.
anya-e0702n:311_2: Sattavassi kassaca sāmaṇerassa arahattaṃ sacchikataṭṭhānataṃ paṭicca yonakabhāsāya etaṃ ṭhānaṃ caṅgamaṅgha iti vuccati.
anya-e0702n:313_0: Sāsane pana pañcatiṃsādhike dvivassasate sampatte mahārakkhitatthero yonakaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā kambojakhemāvara
anya-e0702n:313_2: Tāni hi sabbāni raṭṭhāni saṅgahetvā dassentehi aṭṭhakathācariyehi yonakalokanti okāsakālokavācakena sāmaññasaddena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n:313_3: Pakati hesā ganthakārānaṃ yena kenacākārena atthantarassa viññāpanāti.
anya-e0702n:314_0: Mahārakkhitatthero ca saddhiṃ pañcahi bhikkhūhi pāṭaliputtato anilapathamaggena yonakalokaṃ āgantvā kāḷakārāmasuttena yonake pasādesi.
anya-e0702n:315_0: Yonakaraṭṭhaṃ tadā gantvā, so mahārakkhito isi;
anya-e0702n:317_0: Tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ sissaparamparā bahū honti, gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
anya-e0702n:320_0: Yonakaraṭṭhe lakunnanagare jinacakke pañcavassasate maṇimayaṃ buddhappaṭimaṃ māpetvā visukammadevaputto nāgasenattherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n:320_1: Nāgesenatthero ca tasmiṃ paṭimamhi dhātu āgantvā patiṭṭhātūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:320_2: Adhiṭṭhānavaseneva sattadhātuyo āgantvā tattha patiṭṭhahitvā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassesunti rājavaṃse vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n:321_0: Tañca vacanaṃ mama parinibbānato pañcavassasate atikkante ete uppajjissantīti milindapañhāyaṃ vuttavacanena kālaparimāṇavasena ca sameti.
anya-e0702n:321_1: Yonakaraṭṭhe milindarañño kāle jinacakke pañcavassasateyeva nāgasenattheraṃ paṭissa jinacakkaṃ virūḷaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:324_0: Kaliyuge pañcasaṭṭhivasselabhuñjanagarato saṅkamitvā kyuṅgaranagare māpikassa baññācomaṅgara nāmakassa
anya-e0702n:324_1: rañño kāle majjhimadesato kassapatthero pañcahi therehi saddhiṃ āgacchi.
anya-e0702n:325_0: Tadā so rājā vihāraṃ katvā tesaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n:325_1: Sīhaḷadīpato ca dhātuyo ānetvā eko thero āgacchi.
anya-e0702n:325_2: Dhātuto pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasīditvā labhuñjacetiya nidhānaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:325_3: Te ca there paṭicca yonakaraṭṭhe sāsana vaṃso āgato.
anya-e0702n:327_0: Kaliyuge dvāsaṭṭhādhike sattasate sampatthe cinaraṭṭhindo rājā abhibhavitvā sakalampi yonakaraṭṭhaṃ saṅkhubtitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0702n:327_1: Tadā mahādhammagambhīratthero mahāmedhaṅkaratthe rocāti dve thero yonakaraṭṭhato saddhiṃ bahūhi bhikkhūhi sīhaḷadīpaṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:327_2: Tadā ca sīhaḷadīpe dubbhikkhabhayena abhibhūto hutvā tato syāmaraṭṭhe sokkatayanagaraṃ puna agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:328_0: Tato pacchā lakunnanagaraṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhantānaṃ lajjipesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:328_1: Te ca thero syāmaraṭṭhe yonakaraṭṭhe ca sabbattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesunti.
anya-e0702n:329_0: Idaṃ yonakaraṭṭhe pattalaṅke dve there paṭicca pañcamaṃ
anya-e0702n:331_0: Kaliyuge pañcavīsādhike aṭṭhavassasate sampatte sirisaddhammalokapaticakkavattirājā labhuñjacetiyaṃ puna
anya-e0702n:331_1: mahantaṃ katvā tassa cetiyassa samīpe cattāro vihāre kārāpetvā mahāmedhaṅkarattherassa sāriputtattherassa ca adāsi.
anya-e0702n:331_2: Tadāpi te dve therā sāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ katvā patiṭṭhāpesunti.
anya-e0702n:334_0: Kaliyuge tecattālīsādhike navavassasate sampatte haṃsāvatīnagare anekasetibhindo nāma rājā yonakaraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n:334_1: abhibhavitvā attano hatthagataṃ katvā bali bhuñjanatthāya jeṭṭhaputtassa anuruddhassa nāma rājakumārassa
anya-e0702n:334_2: datvā bahūhi amaccehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā anurājatāvena rajjaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n:334_3: Sāsanañca visodhāpetuṃ saddhammacakkasāmittheraṃ tena saddhiṃ pahiṇi.
anya-e0702n:335_0: Anekasetibhinno kira rājā yonakaraṭṭhaṃ vijayakāle paṭhamaṃ sāsanassa patiṭṭhānabhūtamidanti katvā taṃraṭṭhavāsino karamarānītabhāvena na aggahesīti.
anya-e0702n:336_0: Yathāvuttattheravaṃsesu ca eko lakunnanagare araññavāsī thero tattha nagare ajja asukasmiṃ ṭhāne eko
anya-e0702n:336_1: matoti gihīnaṃ kathetvā yathākathitaṃ bhūtaṃ hutvā ayaṃ abhiññālābhīti pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n:337_0: Tasmiṃyeva ca nagare mahāmaṅgalo nāma thero anekasetibhindassa rañño yujjhituṃ āgatakāle anekasetibhindo rājā maṃ pakkosissati,
anya-e0702n:337_2: Yathāvuttaniyāmeneva pakkosanato ayaṃ abhiññā lābhīti kitti ghoso ahosi.
anya-e0702n:338_0: Tattha nagare ñāṇavilāsatthero saṅkhyāpakāsakaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:338_1: Taṃḷīkaṃ pana pattalaṅkattherassa vihāre vasanto sirimaṅgalonāma thero akāsi.
anya-e0702n:339_0: Visuddhimaggadīpaniṃ pana saṃññvattaaraññavāsī uttarārāmo nāma eko thero.
anya-e0702n:339_3: Taṃ kira uppātasantiṃ sajjhāyitvā cīnarañño senaṃ ajinīti.
anya-e0702n:339_4: Iccevaṃ yonakaraṭṭhe abhiññālābhīnaṃ ganthakārānañca therānaṃ ānubhāvena jinasāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0702n:339_5: Evaṃ hetuphalasambandhavasena ādi anta sambandhavasena ca yathāvuttehi tīhi nayehi theraparamparā ghaṭṭetvā gahetabbā.
anya-e0702n:343_2: Jinacakke hi ekādhike vassasate sampatte jaṭilo sakko nāgo garuḷo kumbhaṇḍo candī paramīsvarocāti ime satta sirikhettaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:343_3: Tattha dvattapoṅko nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:343_5: Tadā bhagavato sāvakā arahantā tisahassamattā tattha vasiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:343_6: So rājā tesaṃ arahantānaṃ devasikaṃ catūhi paccayehi upatthambhi.
anya-e0702n:343_7: Cha sarīradhātuyo ca ekekaṃ ekekasmiṃ nidahitvā cha cetiiyāni kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n:343_8: Dakkhiṇabāhuṃ pana nidahitvā ekampi cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n:344_0: Uṇhīsadhātuṃ pana kaṅgarannagarato ānetvā ekampi cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n:344_2: Pacchā anuruddharājā gahetvā arimaddananagaraṃ ānetvā caññiṅkhu nāma cetiye nidhānaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n:344_3: Tasmā rakkhitattherassa āgamanato pubbepi sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:344_4: Tato pacchā sāsanaṃ dubbalaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:346_0: Mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena pana pesito rakkhitatthero vanavāsīraṭṭhaṃ gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā anamataggapariyāyakathāya vanavāsike pasādesi.
anya-e0702n:351_0: Evaṃ vanavāsīraṭṭhe pubbeyeva sāsanaṃ ogāhetvā patiṭṭhahi. Na pana tāva sakalaṃ byāpetvā patiṭṭhahi.
anya-e0702n:354_0: Jinacakke pana tettiṃsādhike catuvassasate kukkuṭa sīso nāma eko rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n:354_1: Tassa rañño kāle bhagavato sāvakā arahantā pañcasatamattā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n:354_2: Tesampi so rājā devasikaṃ catūhi paccayehi upatthambhesi.
anya-e0702n:357_0: Iccevaṃ vanavāsīraṭṭhe anekasatehi arahantattherehi sāsanaṃ puṇṇindusaṅkāsaṃ hutvā ativiya vijjotesi.
anya-e0702n:357_1: Sāsanika ganthakārā pana mahātherā tattha na sandissanti.
anya-e0702n:357_2: Arahantattherā pana rājūnaṃ āyācanaṃ ārabbha dhammasatthaṃ ekaṃ viracayiṃsūti porāṇā vadantīti. Iccevaṃ–
anya-e0702n:369_1: Idāni pana marammamaṇḍale aparantaraṭṭhe sāsanavaṃsaṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n:369_2: Amhākañhi marammaraṭṭhe suppādakatitthe vāṇijagāme vasante cūḷapuṇṇa mahāpuṇṇedve bhātike paṭicca bhagavato
anya-e0702n:369_5: Teneva puna sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero yonakadhammarakkhitattheraṃ pesesīti.
anya-e0702n:370_0: Bhagavā pana lohitacandanavihāraṃ paṭiggahetvā sattasattāhāni nisīditvā samāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammarasaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n:370_1: Sattāhesu ca ekasmiṃ ahu caturāsītipāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0702n:370_2: Pañcasatamattehi ca pāsādehi āgacchanto antarāmagge saccabandhapabbate nisinnassa saccabandhassa nāma
anya-e0702n:370_3: isino dhammaṃ desetvā chahi abhiññāhi saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpesi.
anya-e0702n:370_4: Vāṇijagāme ca isidinnaseṭṭhi ādīnampi dhammarasaṃ pāyesi.
anya-e0702n:370_5: Iccevaṃ saccabandhaisidinnamahāpuṇṇādayo paṭicca amhākaṃ marammamaṇḍale sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:373_0: Bhagavato parinibbutato pañcatiṃsādhike dvivassasate sampatte tatiyasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyitvā avasāne mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero
anya-e0702n:373_1: attano saddhivihārikaṃ yonakadhammarakkhitattheraṃ saddhiṃ catūhi bhikkhūhi aparantaraṭṭhaṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n:374_0: Yonakadhammarakkhitattheropi aparantaraṭṭhaṃ āgantvā aggikkhandhopamasuttena raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ pasādesi.
anya-e0702n:374_5: Tañca na aggikkhandhopamasuttantaṃ sutvā pabbajantīnaṃ itthīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0702n:374_6: atha kho ādito paṭṭhāya yāvacirakālā sāsanaṃ pasīditvā pabbajantīnaṃ itthīnaṃ vasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:374_8: itthīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santikeyeva pabbajituṃ yuttattā yonakadhammarakkhitattherena ca saddhiṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ anāgatattā.
anya-e0702n:374_9: Evaṃ cirakālaṃ atikkamitvā pacchā bhikkhuniyo āgantvā tāsaṃ santike pabbajitānaṃ vasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n:374_10: Sīhaḷadīpe anuḷādeviyo pabbajitakāle mahāmahindattherassa saṅghamittātheriyā pakkosanatā idha ñāpakāti.
anya-e0702n:374_11: Evaṃ yonakadhammarakkhitattheraṃ paṭicca aparantaraṭṭhe sattānaṃ bahupakāro ahosi.
anya-e0702n:377_4: tasmā puṇṇasaccabandhādayo paṭicca bhagavato dharamānassa vīsativassakāleyeva sāsanaṃ aparantaraṭṭhe
anya-e0702n:377_5: patiṭṭhahitvā kasmiñci kasmiñci ṭhāne bhikkhūnaṃ saṃvijjamānattā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgahetvā desetuṃ
anya-e0702n:377_6: pacchā āgatānañca bhikkhūnaṃ parisuddhācārataṃ viññāpetuṃ aggikkhandhopamasuttaṃ thero desesīti.
anya-e0702n:377_7: Evañca sati arimaddananagare samaṇakuttakānaṃ saṃvijjamānabhāvaṃ vakkhamānena vacanena sameti.
anya-e0702n:380_1: bhagavā puṇṇattherassa yācanamārabbha aparantaraṭṭhaṃ āgantvā vāṇije hi kārite candanavihāre vasitvā
anya-e0702n:380_2: ekasmiṃ samaye ānandena pacchāsamaṇena tambadīparaṭṭhampi desacārikaṃ āhiṇḍi.
anya-e0702n:380_3: Āhiṇḍitvā arimaddananagaraṭṭhānasamīpaṃ patvā pabbatamuddhani ṭhatvā anāgate kho ānanda imasmiṃ padese
anya-e0702n:380_4: sammuti nāma rājā arimaddanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpessati,
anya-e0702n:380_5: tasmiñca nagare mama sāsanaṃ virūḷaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahissatīti byākāsi.
anya-e0702n:381_0: Yonakadhammarakkhitatthero ca aparantaraṭṭhaṃ āgantvā tambadīparaṭṭhampi āhiṇḍitvā tambadīparaṭṭhavāsīnampi dhammarasaṃ pāyesiyeva.
anya-e0702n:381_1: Ayamattho khattiyakulato eva purisasahassāni pabbajiṃsūti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati.
anya-e0702n:381_4: khattiye ca āsante kuto khattiyakulāni bhavissanti,
anya-e0702n:382_1: Amhākañhi marammamaṇḍale tambadīparaṭṭhe arimaddananagare sammutirājā nāma bhūpālo rajjaṃ karesi.
anya-e0702n:382_2: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva anuruddharaññā samathi nāmake dese nisinnānaṃ tiṃsamattānaṃ samaṇakuttakānaṃ saṭṭhisahassamattānaṃ sissānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā cariṃsu.
anya-e0702n:383_2: so īdisaṃ parittaṃ bhaṇanto tamhā pāpakammā parimucceyya,
anya-e0702n:383_3: sace pana yo mātāpitaraṃ hantvā anantariyakammato parimuccitukāmo bhaveyya,
anya-e0702n:383_8: bahu apuññaṃ pasaveyyāti evamādīhi micchāvādehi attano attano upagatānaṃ ovādaṃ adaṃsu.
anya-e0702n:383_9: Tamatthaṃ sutvā anuruddharājā paricitapuñño tesaṃ vādaṃ na ruci.
anya-e0702n:384_0: Tadā ca arimaddananagare arahanto nāma thero āgantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:385_1: tadā hi sunāparantatambadīparaṭṭhesu sabbena sabbaṃ sabbadā thiraṃ sāsanaṃ na tāva patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n:385_2: Teneva bhagavato byākataniyāmena sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmāti cintetvā mahātherā sakkassa devānamindassa
anya-e0702n:385_3: santikaṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ anuggahituṃ samatthaṃ puggalaṃ dehīti yāciṃsu.
anya-e0702n:385_4: Sakkoca devānamindo tāvatiṃsabhavane ekaṃ devaputtaṃ yācitvā ekissā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:385_5: Dasamāsaccayena vijāyanakāle sīlabuddhi nāma thero anurakkhitvā vaye sampatte pabbājesi.
anya-e0702n:385_6: Tīsu piṭakesu ativiya cheko hutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0702n:386_0: Soca thero marammamaṇḍale jinasāsanaṃ vijjotāpetuṃ arimaddananagaraṃ āgantvā nagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ araññe nisīdi.
anya-e0702n:386_1: Tadā sakko devānamindo ekaṃ nesādaṃ palobhetvā tassa theraṃ dassesi.
anya-e0702n:386_6: Evaṃ pana cintetvā rañño dassanatthāya nagaraṃ ānesi.
anya-e0702n:386_8: Nesādā ca theraṃ ānetvā rañño dassesi.
anya-e0702n:387_2: imassa abbhantare sāradhammo atthi maññeti laddhasūriyobhāsaṃviya padumaṃ phullacittaṃ hutvā vīmaṃsetukāmo theraṃ āha,–
anya-e0702n:388_2: avassaṃ aggapuggalo bhaveyyāti cintetvā tvaṃ kassa ñāti,
anya-e0702n:389_1: tava ācariyena desitaṃ dhammaṃ ekadesato desehīti.
anya-e0702n:389_2: Atha yathā siridhammāsokarañño nigrodhasāmaṇerena appamādadhammo desito,
anya-e0702n:390_4: tumhādisā aññe atthi vā mā vāti.
anya-e0702n:390_9: mayā añño paramattha sammutivasena duvidhopi saṅgho atthīti.
anya-e0702n:391_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā bhiyyosomattāya pasanno hutvā puna ārocesi,–
anya-e0702n:391_1: mama bhante imasmiṃ paccakkhe natthi tayā añño nātho,
anya-e0702n:392_0: Tato pacchā araññakaṅgārahe ṭhāne vihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi.
anya-e0702n:392_2: yathā pana suvaṇṇapātiṃ labhitvā suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ labhitvā mattikābhājananti.
anya-e0702n:392_3: Sakalepi ca raṭṭhe samaṇakuttakānaṃ vādaṃ jahāpesi.
anya-e0702n:392_4: Tasmiñca kāle samaṇakuttakā hīnalābhā hutvā therassa upanāhaṃ bandhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:392_5: Te pana samaṇakuttakā araññe nissāmikāviya koleyakā sunakhā anāthā hutvā kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ labhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n:393_0: Rājā ca tamatthaṃ ñatvā yathā samaṇakuttakā nābhibhavanti,
anya-e0702n:393_2: Te ca samaṇakuttake setavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā āvudhagāhayodhabhāvena rājakamme niyojāpesi.
anya-e0702n:393_3: Thero ca sāsane pasanne jane pabbājetvā upasampādetvā sāsanaṃ visodhāpesi.
anya-e0702n:393_4: Rājā ca imasmiṃ raṭṭhe porāṇikā rājāno samaṇakuttakānaṃ vādaṃ gahetvā rajjaṃ kāresuṃ,
anya-e0702n:393_5: sace hi pana tesaṃ anatthakarajjaṃ puna gaṇhāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n:393_6: evaṃ sati ahaṃ tesaṃ anatthakarajjaṃ apanetvā sātthakarajjaṃ gaṇhāpetumicchāmīti anusocīti.
anya-e0702n:395_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kira vippavāsīnagare nisinno eko bhikkhuupadvārāvatīnagaraṃ gantvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhi.
anya-e0702n:395_1: Tato pacchā sudhamma puraṃ gantvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhi.
anya-e0702n:395_2: Tasmiñca kāle sirikhettanagare pāṭalirukkhe eko gantho atthīti sutvā sudhammapurato sirikhettanagaraṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n:395_3: Antarāmagge luddhako theraṃ passitvā ayaṃ yakkhoti maññitvā gahetvā anuruddharañño dassesi.
anya-e0702n:396_3: Puna rājā pucchi,–tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ kīdisoti.
